SA11n1106:43: kevalaṃ netravikalā iva dānādayaḥ prajñānetṛkā eva yathābhimatāṃ saugatīṃ bhūmimabhisarantīti prajñopanāyakā ucyante,
SA11n1106:51: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte sūryamaṇḍalaṃ candramaṇḍalaṃ ca caturṣu dvīpeṣu karma karoti,

SA11n1106:58: evameva subhūte pañca pāramitāḥ prajñāpāramitāvirahitatvānna pāramitānāmadheyaṃ labhante |
SA11n1106:59: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte yāḥ kāścana kunadyaḥ,
SA11n1106:62: evameva subhūte pañca pāramitāḥ prajñāpāramitāparigṛhītā yena sarvākārajñatā tenānugacchanti |

SA11n1106:70: tadyathāpi nāma kauśika jātyandhānāṃ śataṃ vā sahasraṃ vā apariṇāyakānāmabhavyaṃ mārgāvataraṇāya,
SA11n1106:72: evameva kauśika acakṣuṣkāḥ pañca pāramitā jātyandhabhūtā bhavanti vinā prajñāpāramitayā apariṇāyakāḥ,
SA11n1106:75: yadā punaḥ kauśika pañca pāramitāḥ prajñāpāramitāparigṛhītā bhavanti,

SA11n1106:105: sā ca aparāparabhūmipratilambhayogena prakarṣamabhivardhayantī yāvadubhayāvaraṇavigamāt sakalakalpanājālavigatabuddhatvasvabhāvaprajñāṃ niṣpādayati |

SA11n1106:121: evaṃ pūrvapūrvasya kāraṇabhūtasya nirodhāduttarottarakāryabhūtasya nirodho veditavyaḥ |
SA11n1106:123: evamasya kevalasya mahato duḥkhaskandhasya nirodho bhavati |

SA11n1106:128: evameva trivartma nirātmakam ātmātmīyarahitaṃ saṃbhavati ca saṃbhavayogena,
SA11n1106:132: tadevaṃ prajñayā svapnamāyādisvabhāvaṃ saṃskṛtaṃ pratyavekṣamāṇasya sarvadharmāṇāṃ niḥsvabhāvatayā pratipatteḥ paramārthādhigamāt savāsananiḥśeṣadoṣarāśivinivṛttirbhavatīti sarvaduḥkhopaśamahetuḥ prajñā upapadyate ||
SA11n1106:133: yathā ca yuktyāgamābhyāṃ vicārayataḥ aviparītavastutattvapravicayaḥ samupajāyate,
SA11n1106:137: saṃvriyate āvriyate yathābhūtaparijñānaṃ svabhāvāvaraṇādāvṛtaprakāśanācca anayeti saṃvṛtiḥ |

SA11n1106:155: tathā hi kiṃcit pratītyajātaṃ nīlādikaṃ vasturūpamadoṣavadindriyairūpalabdhaṃ lokata eva satyam,
SA11n1106:156: māyāmarīcipratibimbādviṣu pratītya samupajātamapi doṣavadindriyopalabdhaṃ yathāsvaṃ tīrthikasiddhāntaparikalpitaṃ ca lokata eva mithyā | taduktam-
SA11n1106:174: sarvasya hi pratītyasamutpannasya padārthasya niḥsvabhāvatā pāramārthikaṃ rūpam,
SA11n1106:176: tathā hi-na tāvat yathāparidṛśyamānarūpeṇa satsvabhāvo bhāvaḥ,
SA11n1106:186: hetupratyayasāmagrīṃ pratītya jātasya parāyattātmalābhasyapratibimbasyeva kutaḥ satsvabhāvatā ?
SA11n1106:187: na ca kasyacit padārthasya paramārthato hetupratyayasāmagrītaḥ samutpattiḥ saṃbhavati,
SA11n1106:190: itthaṃ kāraṇānurūpaṃ kāryamicchatā kathaṃ niḥsvabhāvāt sasvabhāvasyotpattirabhyupetavyā?
SA11n1106:193: āyāti tatkutaḥ kutra yāti ceti nirūpyatām ||
SA11n1106:202: iti śūnyebhya eva śūnyā dharmāḥ prabhavanti dharmebhya iti ||
SA11n1106:203: na ca svaparobhayarūpahetunibandhanamahetunibandhanaṃ vā bhāvasya janma atipeśalamupapadyate |
SA11n1106:204: tathā hi ātmasvarūpaṃ bhāvānāṃ svajanmanimittaṃ bhavet,
SA11n1106:207: tasya sarvātmanā svayaṃ niṣpannatvāt kva punarasya vyāpāro'stu ?
SA11n1106:213: na cāpi svatautpattipakṣe prāṅniṣpannaṃ svarūpamitaretarāśrayadoṣasaṅgāt kasyacit saṃbhavati |
SA11n1106:220: janyajanakaikatvaikasaṃtatipratiniyamo'pi anutpanne kārye kālpanikatayā vastuto na saṃgacchate |
SA11n1106:230: utpattau vā na kiṃcijjanayitavyamastīti kutra ubhayarūpasya hetorvyāpāraḥ syāt?
SA11n1106:232: yato nāyaṃ prasajyapratiṣedhātmatayā ahetuta iti yujyate |
SA11n1106:238: tasmānna svaparobhayarūpahetubhya utpadyante satsvabhāvā bhāvāḥ | taduktam-
SA11n1106:239: na svato nāpi parato na dvābhyāṃ nāpyahetutaḥ |
SA11n1106:240: utpannā jātu vidyante bhāvāḥ kvacana kecana ||iti |
SA11n1106:249: evaṃ niḥsvabhāvataiva sarvabhāvānāṃ nijaṃ pāramārthikaṃ rūpamavatiṣṭhate |
SA11n1106:252: anyathā bhāvābhiniveśo vā śūnyatābhiniveśo veti na kaścidviśeṣaḥ,
SA11n1106:254: na ca abhāvasya kalpitasvabhāvatayā kiṃcit svarūpamasti |
SA11n1106:257: yadi ca bhāvasyaiva kaścit svabhāvaḥ syāt,
SA11n1106:260: ato na bhāvanivṛttirūpaḥ abhāvo nāma kaścit |
SA11n1106:261: na ca bhāvābhāvayoruktakrameṇa asattve pratipādite tadubhayasaṃkīrṇātmatā saṃbhavati ubhayapratiṣedhasvabhāvatā vā,
SA11n1106:263: tasminnirākṛte sarva eva amī ekaprahāreṇa nirastā bhavantīti | tasmāt-
SA11n1106:267: subhūtirāha-ihāyuṣman śāradvatīputra bodhisattvayānikaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā anupāyakuśalo rūpaṃ śūnyamiti prajānāti, saṅgaḥ |
SA11n1106:272: evaṃ cakṣuḥ śrotraṃ ghrāṇaṃ jivhā kāyo manaḥ,
SA11n1106:293: etaduktaṃ bhavati-sarva eva amī ādhyātmikā bāhyāśca bhāvāḥ svabhāvadvayamābibhrataḥ samupajāyante yaduta sāṃvṛtaṃ pāramārthikaṃ ca |
SA11n1106:310: idameva satyadvayaṃ nānyat satyamastīti avadhāraṇārtho'pi yujyate cakāraḥ | taduktam-
SA11n1106:318: satyu na sidhyati kiṃ ca tṛtīyu ||iti |

SA11n1106:320: tat kathaṃ dve eva satye iti ?
SA11n1106:321: satyam, kiṃ tarhi vaineyajanāśayānuśayavaśādete dve eva catvāri kṛtvā kathitāni (kathite ?)
SA11n1106:326: syādetat-saṃvṛtiravidyopadarśitātmatayā abhūtasamāropasvarūpatvādvicārāt śataśo viśīryamāṇāpi kathaṃ satyamiti |
SA11n1106:331: ata eva lokasaṃvṛtisatyaṃ ceti śāstre'pi viśeṣa ukta ācāryapādaiḥ |
SA11n1106:335: ekameva bhikṣavaḥ paramaṃ satyaṃ yaduta apramoṣadharma nirvāṇam,
SA11n1106:339: paramārthasatyaṃ tu na jñāyate kīdṛk kiṃsvabhāvaṃ kiṃlakṣaṇamiti |
SA11n1106:343: kenacit prakāreṇa tat sarvabuddhiviṣayīkartuṃ na śakyate iti yāvat |
SA11n1106:346: ataḥ sarvopādhiśūnyatvāt kathaṃ kayācit kalpanayā paśyet ?

SA11n1106:351: yathā timiraprabhāvāt taimirikaḥ sarvamākāśadeśaṃ keśoṇḍukamaṇḍitamitastato mukhaṃ vikṣipannapi paśyati |
SA11n1106:352: tathā kurvantamavekṣya ataimirikaḥ kimayaṃ karotīti tatsamīpamupasṛtya tadupalabdhakeśapraṇihitalocano'pi na keśākṛtimupalabhate,

SA11n1106:355: tadā tadvikalpāpasāraṇāya tasmai yathābhūtamasau bravīti-nātra keśāḥ santīti |
SA11n1106:357: na ca tena tathā pratipādayatāpi kasyacit pratiṣedhaḥ kṛto bhavati vidhānaṃ vā |
SA11n1106:362: tāneva skandhādīn yena svabhāvena nirastasamastāvidyāvāsanā buddhā bhagavantaḥ paśyanti ataimirikopalabdhakeśadarśananyāyena,
SA11n1106:369: iti paramārthato'vācyamapi paramārthatattvaṃ dṛṣṭāntadvāreṇa saṃvṛtimupādāya kathaṃcit kathitam |
SA11n1106:370: na tu tadaśeṣasāṃvṛtavyavahāravirahitasvabhāvaṃ vastuto vaktuṃ śakyate iti |
SA11n1106:372: anakṣarasya dharmasya śrutiḥ kā deśanā ca kā |

SA11n1106:390: iti naiva kācid buddhiḥ pāramārthikarūpagrāhiṇī paramārthato yujyate |

SA11n1106:406: tacca bhagavatā śūnyataḥ sudṛṣṭaṃ suviditaṃ susākṣātkṛtam |
SA11n1106:418: yāvanna lābho nālabho na sukhaṃ na duḥkhaṃ na yaśo nāyaśo na rūpaṃ nārūpamityādi ||
SA11n1106:424: evaṃ saṃvṛtiparamārthabhedena dvividhaṃ satyaṃ vyavasthāpya tadadhikṛtaśca loko'pi dvividha evetyupadarśayannāha-tatra loke ityādi-
SA11n1106:425: tatra loko dvidhā dṛṣṭo yogī prākṛtakastathā |
SA11n1106:437: so'syāstīti yogī loka ityekaḥ prakāro rāśiḥ |
SA11n1106:440: prākṛta eva prākṛtako loka iti dvitīyaḥ |
SA11n1106:443: syādetat-ubhayorapi yathāsvaṃ tattvadarśitvāt kataraḥ punaranayorbhrāntimānastu ya evānyatareṇa bādhyate ?
SA11n1106:447: tatra tayoryogiprākṛtakayorlokayormadhye prākṛtako lokaḥ prākṛtakatvajātyā samudāyānnirdhāryate,
SA11n1106:455: idamihābhimatam-yathā vibhramāhitasadbhāvaṃ timiropahatacakṣuṣaḥ asadbhūtakeśoṇḍukādidarśino jñānaṃ yathāvasthitavastutattvagrāhiṇo'taimirikajñānena bādhyate,
SA11n1106:457: evamavidyāmalatimiradūṣitabuddhicakṣuṣo viparītavastusvarūpagrāhiṇaḥ prākṛtakasya jñānaṃ prajñāsalilakṣālitavigatamalānāsravajñānacakṣuṣaḥ bhāvanijatattvavedinaḥ yogilokasya jñānena bādhyate,
SA11n1106:466: atha kiṃ prākṛtā eva bādhyante yogibhiḥ,
SA11n1106:473: uttare ca uttare ca uttarottarāḥ, taiḥ |
SA11n1106:479: dhiyo jñānasya prajñāyā viśeṣaḥ tattadāvaraṇavigamāt prakarṣaḥ, tena |
SA11n1106:482: tathā hi-pramuditākhyaprathamabhūmilābhino bodhisattvasya jñānādiguṇāpekṣayā taduttaravimalābhidhānadvitīyabhūmilābhino bodhisattvasya jñānaprabhāvādayo guṇā viśiṣyante |
SA11n1106:486: syādetat-satyapi yogināṃ dhiyo viśeṣe prākṛtajñānaṃ bhrāntamiti kathamavagamayituṃ śakyata ityāha dṛṣṭāntenobhayeṣṭeneti-
SA11n1106:497: atastatra ubhayorapi vipratipatterabhāvāt dṛṣṭāntadharmatā na vihanyate |
SA11n1106:498: yeṣāṃ tu mīmāṃsakādīnāṃ deśakālānyathātmakaṃ vastu eva tattathā pratibhāsate iti matam,
SA11n1106:499: te'nyatra nirākṛtā iti na tanmatamiha nirasyate |
SA11n1106:500: ye tu svayūthyāḥ cittameva vastusat svapnādiṣu tathā pratibhāsate iti manyante,
SA11n1106:503: atastena dṛṣṭāntena viparītavastusvarūpagrāhitayā prākṛtakajñānaṃ bhrāntamiti vyavasthāpyate |
SA11n1106:505: nanu yadi niḥsvabhāvāḥ sarvabhāvā iti vastutattvam,
SA11n1106:506: kathaṃ tarhi sarvasattvasamuddharaṇāśayena dānādiṣu saṃbhāraparipūraṇārthaṃ tattvavedināmapi bodhisattvānāṃ pravṛttiḥ?
SA11n1106:513: tathābhūteṣvapi tatra idaṃpratyayatāniyamasya vidyamānatvāt na hetuphalabhāvasya virodhaḥ |
SA11n1106:515: tathāpi trikoṭipariśuddhyā sādarādiyogena abhyasyamānāḥ tathābhūtā api paramārthādhigamāya hetubhāvamāpadyante,
SA11n1106:528: sarvadharmāṇāṃ paramārthato niḥsvabhāvatvāt hetvanurūpaṃ ca sarvatra phalamiṣyate |
SA11n1106:529: ataḥ sāṃvṛtādapi niḥsvabhāvāddhetoḥ niḥsvabhāvatādhigama eva phalam,
SA11n1106:531: iti dānādayo vastuto niḥsvabhāvā api paramārthatattvādhigamāya sarvasattveṣu karuṇāyamānairbodhisattvairupādīyante,
SA11n1106:539: lokena bhāvā dṛśyante kalpyante cāpi tattvataḥ |
SA11n1106:542: hetupratyayaṃ pratītya bhavanti svarūpaṃ labhante iti bhāvāḥ |
SA11n1106:545: satsvarūpeṇa na kevalaṃ dṛśyante kalpyante cāpi tattvataḥ |
SA11n1106:551: na tu punaryathā yoginā māyeva māyāvat svabhāvaśūnyā dṛśyante,
SA11n1106:553: ityatrāsmin vivādo vipratipattiryogilokayoḥ yoginā saha lokasyetyarthaḥ |
SA11n1106:554: tatpratipanne vastuttattve lokasyāpratipatteḥ lokena saha vā yoginaḥ,
SA11n1106:557: tatra yat sāṃvṛtaṃ tadeva lokena pratīyate,
SA11n1106:563: tat kathamapahrotuṃ śakyata iti parasya hṛdayamāśaṅkayāha pratyakṣamapītyādi-
SA11n1106:567: tadapi prasiddhayā rūḍhyā lokapravādena na pramāṇataḥ |
SA11n1106:568: na pramāṇenādhigataṃ sat pratyakṣaṃ rūpādīti saṃbandhaḥ |
SA11n1106:577: rūpādi tattvaṃ pratyakṣamapi yadi na pramāṇādhigatam,
SA11n1106:581: yathā ca paramārthato'śucini strīkalevarādau tadāsaktiviparyastacetasāṃ śucibuddhirupajāyate |
SA11n1106:588: tathā hi skandhadhātvāyatanādisvabhāvatayā bhagavatā bhāvāḥ sūtre deśitāḥ,
SA11n1106:591: sarvaṃ sarvamiti brāhmaṇa yāvadeva pañca skandhāḥ,
SA11n1106:596: bhūtiryaiṣāṃ kriyā saiva kārakaṃ saiva cocyate ||iti ||
SA11n1106:602: lokānāṃ bhāvābhiniveśināṃ skandhādideśanāvaineyānāṃ sattvānāmāpātataḥ śūnyatādeśanānadhikṛtānāṃ śūnyatāyāmavatāraṇārthaṃ sukumāropakrameṇa pravartanāya |
SA11n1106:606: nāthena narakādiduḥkhāt sattvān paritrāyamāṇena abhyudayaniḥśreyasasukhaṃ prāpayatā sattvāśayādivedinā buddhena bhagavatā deśitāḥ prakāśitāḥ,
SA11n1106:613: kathaṃ tarhi te kṣaṇikā ityāha-tattvataḥ kṣaṇikā naite iti |
SA11n1106:614: tattvataḥ paramārthataḥ niḥsvabhāvatvāt kṣaṇikā api na bhavanti ete ime bhāvāḥ |
SA11n1106:617: kathaṃ tarhi deśanāyāmapi kathitā iti manasi nidhāya [āha] saṃvṛtyā cet [iti]-yadi saṃvṛtyā kṣaṇikā abhidhīyanta ityucyate,
SA11n1106:620: saṃvṛtyā kṣaṇikā na paramārthataḥ iti virudhyate na saṃgacchate |
SA11n1106:622: sāṃvyavahāribhirakṣaṇikatvapratīteḥ na kṣaṇikatvaṃ sāṃvṛtaṃ rūpamiti yāvat ||
SA11n1106:623: etat siddhāntavādī pariharati na doṣo yogisaṃvṛtyeti-
SA11n1106:629: ayamabhiprāyaḥ-yadi nāma arvāgdarśanaiḥ kṣaṇikatvaṃ na pratīyate,
SA11n1106:635: kutaḥ punaretat sāṃvṛtamapi kṣaṇikatvādi yogina eva paśyanti nārvāgdarśina ityāha-lokātte tattvadarśina iti |
SA11n1106:645: aśucibhāvanāsamaye aśucīti striyāḥ kāminyā nirūpaṇe vibhāvanāyāṃ lokabādhā syāt,
SA11n1106:658: iti hi māyā ca sattvāśca advayametadadvaidhīkāram |
SA11n1106:672: evaṃ kathaṃ tatra satkārāpakārayoḥ puṇyapāpasamudbhava iti parasyābhiprāyamāśaṅkayannāha māyopamādityādi-
SA11n1106:675: tadā māyopamānniḥsvabhāvājjinādbhagavataḥ puṇyaṃ sukṛtaṃ pūjāsatkārapādavandanādibhiḥ kathaṃ yathā kathamiveti manyase ?
SA11n1106:678: na hi māyākāranirmitapuruṣasatkārāpakārayoḥ puṇyapāpaprasūtiryukteti parasyā bhiprāyaḥ |
SA11n1106:683: ayamabhiprāyaḥ-yathā kasyacit paramārthasato jināt paramārthasat puṇyamupajāyate,
SA11n1106:689: na ca yuktisiddhaṃ paramārthasad vastusvarūpaṃ kiṃcidastīti pratipāditam ||
SA11n1106:691: idaṃ tu kathaṃ samādhīyate ityāha yadi māyopama ityādi-
SA11n1106:692: yadi māyopamaḥ sattvaḥ kiṃ punarjāyate mṛtaḥ ||9 ||
SA11n1106:697: evaṃ sati mahān doṣaḥ prasajyate ityāha-yadītyādi |
SA11n1106:709: yāvatkālaṃ pratyayānāṃ kāraṇānāṃ mantrauṣadhādīnāṃ sāmagrī samudāyaḥ,
SA11n1106:736: evaṃ tarhi yathā māyāpuruṣavadhādau na prāṇātipātaḥ,
SA11n1106:743: samāne'pi niḥsvabhāvatve cittasya vijñānasya māyāpuruṣasaṃtāne'bhāvāt asattvāt na pāpakaṃ na akuśalamutpadyate prāṇātipātādi |
SA11n1106:746: tatrāpi māraṇābhiprāyeṇa prahāraṃ dadato bhavatyeva aśubham,
SA11n1106:748: māyāpuruṣādanyatra kathaṃ prāṇātipāta iti cedāha cittamāyetyādi-
SA11n1106:763: ādiśabdādauṣadhādīnāṃ cittotpādaṃ prati asāmarthyādavyāpārāt na māyācittasaṃbhavaḥ na māyāsvabhāvaṃ cittaṃ saṃbhavati |
SA11n1106:764: yathā paravyāmohanibandhanānāṃ māyākāraprayuktānāṃ mantrādīnāṃ prabhāveṇa hastyādyākāranirvṛttiḥ,
SA11n1106:770: ata eva nānāpratyayasaṃbhavā nānāpratyayāt anekaprakārakāraṇāt saṃbhava utpādo yasyāḥ sā tathoktā |
SA11n1106:774: na hi ekasmin kārye kiṃcit kāraṇaṃ dṛṣṭamiti kāryaśabdasāmyāt sarvatra tadeva prakalpayituṃ yujyate,
SA11n1106:779: naikasya kvacidupalabdhasāmarthyasya pratyayasya kāraṇasya hetoḥ sarvasāmarthyaṃ sarvasmin kārye sāmarthyaṃ śaktirasti saṃbhavati |
SA11n1106:780: kvacidṛṣṭamiti kṛtvā kutraciditi kasmiṃścit samaye deśe kāle vā dṛṣṭamiṣṭaṃ vā |
SA11n1106:784: etat sarva lokavyavahārānugataṃ kalpanānirmitaṃ sāṃvṛtaṃ vastutattvamupādaya samutthitaṃ na tu paramārthataḥ |
SA11n1106:787: etadasahamānaḥ paraḥ punaranyathā prasañjayannāha nirvṛta iti-
SA11n1106:793: tadā ayaṃ mahān virodhaḥ syādityāha buddho'pi saṃsaredevamityādi-
SA11n1106:795: evamabhyupagamyamāne buddho'pi sarvāvaraṇaprahāṇato nirvṛto'pi saṃsaret janmādibhāg bhavet |
SA11n1106:796: yata evam, tataḥ tasmāt kāraṇāt kiṃ bodhicaryayā ?
SA11n1106:800: sā hi sarvasāṃsārikadharmanivṛttaye sarvaguṇasamuccayāśritabuddhatvaprāptaye ca samāśrīyate,
SA11n1106:810: māyāpi na kevalaṃ saṃsāra iti samuccaye apiśabdaḥ |
SA11n1106:813: saṃvṛttyāpi kālpanikavyavahāreṇāpi na saṃbhavo na saṃsaraṇam |
SA11n1106:816: evamukte maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattva āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputrametadavocat-yaduktaṃ bhagavatā dharmasvāminā sarvajñena-yo bhikṣavaḥ pratītyasamutpādaṃ paśyati,
SA11n1106:832: evamasya kevalasya mahato duḥkhaskandhasya samudayo bhavati |
SA11n1106:835: evamasya kevalasya mahato duḥkhaskandhasya nirodho bhavati |
SA11n1106:838: ya imaṃ pratītyasamutpādaṃ satatasamitaṃ nirjīvaṃ yathāvadaviparītamajātamabhūtamasaṃskṛtamapratighamanālambanaṃ śivamabhayamahāryamavyupaśamasvabhāvaṃ paśyati,
SA11n1106:840: yastu evaṃ satatasamitaṃ yāvadavyupaśamasvabhāvaṃ dharmaṃ paśyati,
SA11n1106:844: eteṣāmeva ṣaṇṇāṃ dhātūnāṃ yā ekasaṃjñā piṇḍasaṃjñā nityasaṃjñā dhruvasaṃjñā śāśvatasaṃjñā sukhasaṃjñā ātmasaṃjñā sattvasaṃjñā jīvasaṃjñā jantusaṃjñā manujasaṃjñā mānavasaṃjñā ahaṃkāramamakārasaṃjñā |
SA11n1106:895: pratyayānāṃ punarucchede sarvathaiva saṃsaraṇaṃ na syāt,
SA11n1106:898: evaṃ tāvat sautrāntikādicodyamudasya yogācāravipratipattinirākaraṇāya tanmatena dūṣaṇamudbhāvayannāha yadā na bhrāntirapītyādi-
SA11n1106:900: yadā sarvaṃ jagat māyātmakatayā svabhāvaśūnyamupagataṃ madhyamakavādibhiḥ,
SA11n1106:905: yasya punaḥ svacittameva paramārthasat bāhyarūpatayā bhrāntaṃ tathā pratibhāsate,
SA11n1106:908: yadā māyaiva te nāsti tadā kimupalabhyate |
SA11n1106:909: yadā māyaiva grāhyatayā hastyādyākārapravṛtyā tava vijñānavādino nāsti,
SA11n1106:916: uktamatra cittameva bahīrūpatayā bhrāntaṃ hastyādyākāraṃ pratibhāsate iti |
SA11n1106:918: kiṃ tu yadyapi cittasyaiva jñānasyaiva sa iti deśādivicchedena grāhyatayā pratibhāsamāna ākāro nirbhāsaḥ,
SA11n1106:923: tathāpi naitat saṃgacchata ityāha cittameva yadā māyetyādi-
SA11n1106:924: cittameva yadā māyā tadā kiṃ kena dṛśyate |
SA11n1106:927: na hi vedakacittavyatiriktā kācidanyā māyā nāma,
SA11n1106:936: nanu syādevaitat yadi jñānasya ātmasaṃvedanaṃ na syāt,
SA11n1106:937: yāvatā svasaṃvedanatayā svarūpaṃ saṃvedayat tadabhinnaṃ māyādipratibhāsamapi vedayet |
SA11n1106:938: tathā ca sati na kācit kṣatiḥ |
SA11n1106:940: uktaṃ ca lokanāthena cittaṃ cittaṃ na paśyati |
SA11n1106:941: svabhāvaśūnyameva sarva jagad yadā yuktitaḥ pratipāditam,
SA11n1106:942: tadā kaḥ kasya svabhāvo vastutaḥ iti kasya kena vedanaṃ syāt ?
SA11n1106:948: kiṃ ca | uktaṃ ca kathitaṃ ca lokanāthena lokānāṃ sarvasattvānāṃ nāthena śaraṇyena buddhena bhagavatā |
SA11n1106:953: yathā sutīkṣṇāpyasidhārā khaṅgadhārā tadanyavadātmānaṃ svakāyaṃ na cchinatti na vighāṭayati,
SA11n1106:957: tathā hi na tadevaikaṃ jñānaṃ vedyavedakavedanātmasvabhāvatrayaṃ yuktam |
SA11n1106:960: sa cittaṃ parigaveṣamāṇo nādhyātmaṃ cittaṃ samanupaśyati |
SA11n1106:974: tadyathā na tasyaiva asidhārayā saiva asiṃdhārā śakyate chettum,
SA11n1106:975: na tenaiva aṅgulyagreṇa tadeva aṅgulyagraṃ spraṣṭuṃ śakyate,
SA11n1106:976: evameva tenaiva cittena tadeva cittaṃ draṣṭumiti vistaraḥ ||
SA11n1106:977: atra cittāmātravādinaḥ svātmani kriyāvirodhaṃ vighaṭayituṃ svapakṣaprasādhanāya dṛṣṭāntamudbhāvayannāha ātmabhāvamityādi-
SA11n1106:979: ātmabhāvaṃ svasvarūpaṃ yathā dīpaḥ pradīpaḥ saṃprakāśayati dyotayati |
SA11n1106:980: yathā hi kila andhakārāvṛtaghaṭādivastupratipattaye pradīpa upādīyate,
SA11n1106:982: api tu ghaṭādi prakāśayanneva ātmānamapi prakāśayati,
SA11n1106:984: na cāpi kvacidvirodho dṛṣṭa iti sarvatra yojanīyam |
SA11n1106:997: na ca avidyāmānasya prakāśanaṃ yuktam, asattvāt |
SA11n1106:1000: syādetat-ātmabhāvamityādinā naitadabhidhīyate yadātmānaṃ ghaṭavat tamasāvṛtaṃ prakāśayati dīpaḥ,
SA11n1106:1010: tathā tena prakāreṇa kiṃcid ghaṭādikaṃ parāpekṣaṃ pradīpādyapekṣaṃ prakāśaṃ dṛśyate,
SA11n1106:1011: kiṃcit punaḥ pradīpādikamanapekṣaṃ ca svayaṃprakāśātmakaṃ dṛśyate upalabhyate |
SA11n1106:1013: evaṃ vijñānavādinā upadarśite viśeṣe siddhāntavādī nīlameva tāvannīlatve paranirapekṣaṃ dṛṣṭāntatvenopadarśitaṃ pratiṣedhayannāha anīlatva ityādi-
SA11n1106:1026: nīlaṃ nīlaguṇayuktamātmānaṃ svarūpamātmanā svayameva na kuryāt,
SA11n1106:1029: tasmānna nīlasyāpi parānapekṣatā nīlatvaṃ prati sphaṭikavat |
SA11n1106:1030: tathā hi sphaṭikopalo'pi vastuto'vasthitarūpa eva upādhisaṃnidhau na nīloparāgamanubhavati,
SA11n1106:1032: nīlopādhiviśeṣahakāriṇaśca pūrvasvarasanirodhāt anya eva nīlaguṇoparaktaḥ sphaṭikopala utpadyate iti siddhāntaḥ |
SA11n1106:1035: nanu priyamidamanuṣṭhitaṃ priyeṇa yasmāt jaḍasvabhāvavyāvṛttātmatayā svahetupratyayāt utpattireva jñānasya prakāśāntaranirapekṣasya ātmaprakāśatā svasaṃvedanamucyate |
SA11n1106:1051: tadā lokata eva bādhā bhavato bhaviṣyati |
SA11n1106:1054: tathā ca sutarāṃ na svasaṃvedanaṃ jñānasya,
SA11n1106:1057: na cāpi jaḍasvabhāvatā madhyamakavādinaṃ prati paramārthataḥ kasyacit siddhā,
SA11n1106:1062: sāṃprataṃ pradīpasya svayaṃprakāśatāmabhyupagamya buddheḥ svasaṃvedanamayuktamiti pratipādayannāha dīpa ityādi-
SA11n1106:1063: dīpaḥ prakāśata iti jñātvā jñānena kathyate |
SA11n1106:1064: buddhiḥ prakāśata iti jñātvedaṃ kena kathyate ||22 ||
SA11n1106:1066: tathāpi na buddhisaṃvedanasādhanaṃ prati sadṛśo dṛṣṭānta iti samudāyārthaḥ |
SA11n1106:1067: dīpaḥ prakāśata iti ābhāsate prakāśāntaranirapekṣaḥ svayameva,
SA11n1106:1068: iti jñātvā pratītya jñānena buddhyā kathyate pratipādyate,
SA11n1106:1071: tat punaḥ kena jñānena jñātvā kathyate iti paraṃ pṛcchati |
SA11n1106:1072: na cātra kiṃcid buddhipratipattinibandhanamastīti asaṃbhāvanāṃ prakāśayati |
SA11n1106:1082: itthaṃ sarvathā buddherapratipattau tatsaṃvedanamatīva ayuktamityāha prakāśā vetyādi-
SA11n1106:1083: prakāśā vāprakāśā vā yadā dṛṣṭā na kenacit |
SA11n1106:1089: na pratipannā kenacit pratipantrā svayaṃrūpeṇa vā |
SA11n1106:1091: tadā vandhyāyā aprasavadharmiṇyāḥ striyā duhitā putrī,
SA11n1106:1100: tadapratīteḥ tasyā api apratītiriti kathyamānāpi yuktirahitena vacanamātreṇa sā svasaṃvittirmudhāḥ,
SA11n1106:1105: yadi svasaṃvedanaṃ vijñānasya nāsti na vidyate,
SA11n1106:1110: tasmādanubhavaphalasya smaraṇasya uttarakālaṃ darśanāt jñānasaṃvedanamastītyanumīyate iti |
SA11n1106:1112: yato yadi svasaṃvedanakāryatayā smaraṇaṃ niścitaṃ bhavet,
SA11n1106:1113: bhaved vahveryathā dhūmaḥ svasaṃvedanasya kāraṇaṃ smṛtiḥ |
SA11n1106:1121: iti svasaṃvedanakāryatāni ścayamantareṇa smaraṇasya tadvinābhāvānna saṃvedanasiddhiḥ |
SA11n1106:1122: ataḥ smaraṇamapi jñānatvāt kathaṃ siddhamiti vaktavyam |
SA11n1106:1124: na ca smaraṇaṃ svasaṃvedanasya pratyakṣatayā grāhakam,
SA11n1106:1128: anyatvāviśeṣāt saṃtānāntarabhāvināpi smaraṇena tasya grahaṇaṃ syāt |
SA11n1106:1129: atha tena pūrvamananubhūtatvānna smaryata iti cet,
SA11n1106:1135: kālpanikatve ca sarvavyavahārāṇāṃ kalpanānirmitatvāt sāṃvṛtatvamiti sādhitaṃ naḥ sādhyam |
SA11n1106:1137: bhavato'pi kathaṃ tarhi svasaṃvedanābhāve smṛtirityāha anyānubhūta ityādi-
SA11n1106:1139: jñānādanyasmin grāhye vastuni viṣaye'nubhūte sati jñāne smṛtiḥ smaraṇamupajāyate |
SA11n1106:1140: nanu anyasminnanubhūte anyatra smaraṇe atiprasaṅgaḥ syādityāha-saṃbandhāditi |
SA11n1106:1144: satyapi saṃbandhe anyasminnanubhūte anyasya smaraṇe viplutaṃ smaraṇaṃ syāditi cenna,
SA11n1106:1147: jñānameva ca viṣayānubhavo nānya iti viṣayānubhavasmaraṇāttatsaṃbaddhatayā jñāne smaraṇamabhidhīyate,
SA11n1106:1148: na tu viṣayarahitaṃ jñānamapi kevalamanusmaryate ityadoṣaḥ ||
SA11n1106:1150: ākhuviṣaṃ mūṣikaviṣaṃ yathā saṃbandhāt kālāntareṇa jāyate,
SA11n1106:1152: tathā hi mūṣikaviṣamekasmin kṣaṇe śarīrasaṃkrāntaṃ punaḥ kālāntareṇa meghastanitamadhigamya vināpi svasaṃvedanāhitasmṛtivāsanābījamidaṃpratyayatāmātrāyatavṛttitvāt anyasmin kṣaṇe vikṛtimupayāti,
SA11n1106:1157: īkṣaṇikādividyā paracittādijñānābhijñā ca tābhyāṃ yuktasya tatsāmagrīsaṃbaddhasya cittasya darśanāt pratibhāsanāt vijñānasya khaṃ prakāśate svarūpaṃ pratibhāsate |
SA11n1106:1159: yadi hi tat sarvadā parokṣarūpaṃ kathaṃ kadācit sāmagrīviśeṣādupalabhyeta,
SA11n1106:1167: tasmād dṛṣṭaḥ pratītaḥ ghaṭo nidhānādi vā naiva añjanaṃ bhavati |
SA11n1106:1170: evamīkṣaṇikādividyāsahakāriṇā jñānena paracittaṃ ca ghaṭādivad dṛṣṭamiti naitāvatā tatsaṃvedanaṃ siddhaṃ syāt |
SA11n1106:1179: tadgahaṇābhyupagame ca uttarottarasya apratītasya pratītaye jñānāntarānusaraṇena anavasthāprasaṅgācca na kathaṃcidapi arthasya pratītiriti |
SA11n1106:1183: sarvaścāyaṃ dṛṣṭādivyavahāro loke na syādityāha yathā dṛṣṭamityādi |
SA11n1106:1191: yathā dṛṣṭaṃ śrutaṃ jñātaṃ naiveha pratiṣidhyate |
SA11n1106:1192: iti | yathā dṛṣṭamiti cakṣurādivijñānena pratyakṣeṇa pratipannam |
SA11n1106:1200: tena jñānasaṃvedanābhāvādarthānadhigamādayo'pi doṣāḥ paramārthapakṣavādina iha nāvataranti |
SA11n1106:1202: kiṃ nāma tarhi pratiṣidhyate ityāha satyata ityādi-
SA11n1106:1215: duḥkhaṃ samudayo loko dṛṣṭisthānaṃ bhavaśca te |
SA11n1106:1220: na tu vāstavaṃ kiṃcit pratiṣidhyate iti |
SA11n1106:1221: tadevaṃ svasaṃvedanaṃ jñānasya na kathaṃcidacidapi yujyate | taduktam-
SA11n1106:1223: yatra boddhā ca bodhyaṃ ca tatra bodhirna vidyate ||iti |
SA11n1106:1226: idānīṃ prāsaṅgikaṃ parisamāpya prakṛte yojayannāha cittādanyetyādi-
SA11n1106:1228: vastu cetsā kathaṃ nānyānanyā cennāsti vastutaḥ ||27 ||
SA11n1106:1236: dvitīyapakṣe tu “yadā māyaiva te nāsti“ [9.6] ityādinā pratipādita eva doṣaḥ |
SA11n1106:1246: anyonyaparihāravatorekapratiṣedhasya aparavidhināntarīyakatvāt tayorekatrābhāvāt caturthī kalpanā sāpi na saṃghaṭate ||
SA11n1106:1249: yadi sā māyā vastusatī kathaṃ nānyā cittādvayatiriktā na bhavati ?
SA11n1106:1254: tasyāstatsvabhāvatvāt cittameva kevalam ityetat tadevāyātam | yaduktam-
SA11n1106:1255: yadā māyaiva te nāsti tadā kimupalabhyate |iti ||
SA11n1106:1257: asatyapi yathā māyā dṛśyā draṣṭṛ tathā manaḥ |
SA11n1106:1263: tena “yadā na bhrāntirapyasti“ [9.15] ityādi yaduktaṃ pareṇa tat prasādhya upasaṃhāreṇa darśitam |
SA11n1106:1264: punarapi prakārāntareṇa paramārthasadvijñānasādhanāya paropakramamabhisaṃdhāya āha vastvāśrayaścetyādi-
SA11n1106:1266: tathāhi-saṃkleśo vyavadānaṃ ca heyopādeyatayā dvayamidaṃ yathāvat pratipattavyam |
SA11n1106:1271: tadevaṃ saṃkleśavyavadānayorvastusamudbhūtacittamantareṇa vyavasthāpanaṃ na ghaṭate iti manyante,
SA11n1106:1275: tadeva paramataṃ nirūpayati-vastveva vastusadbhūtacittameva āśrayaḥ asyeti vastvāśrayaḥ |
SA11n1106:1301: tathāpi vastusadbhūtacittasamāśritatvāt tasya arthakriyāsāmarthyaṃ bhaviṣyatītyāha vastvāśrayeṇetyādi-
SA11n1106:1308: tathāpi vastvāśrayeṇa vastusadbhūtacittasamāśrayeṇa abhāvasya asadātmakasya kriyāvattvam,
SA11n1106:1324: astu nāma, tathāpi na bādhakānmuktirityāha grāhyamuktamityādi-
SA11n1106:1325: grāhyamuktaṃ yadā cittaṃ tadā sarve tathāgatāḥ |
SA11n1106:1329: grāhakābhāve ca tadupakalpitasya abhilāpyasyābhāvāt abhilāpasyābhāva ityupadarśayituṃ grāhyamuktamityuktam |
SA11n1106:1331: tadā tasya cittasya sarvasattvasaṃtānāntargatatvāt sarvasaṃsāriṇaḥ sattvāḥtathāgatā buddhā bhagavantaḥ prāpnuvanti |
SA11n1106:1335: tasmāt satyapi grāhyagrāhakavaidhurye bhāvābhiniveśasya tadavasthatvānna sarvathā saṃkleśaprahāṇamityabhisaṃdhāyāha evaṃ cetyādi-
SA11n1106:1336: evaṃ ca ko guṇo labdhaścittamātre'pi kalpite ||30 ||
SA11n1106:1343: nanu etatsamānaṃ niḥsvabhāvavādino bhavato'pīti samānadūṣaṇatāmāpādayannāha māyopamatve'pītyādi-
SA11n1106:1345: māyopamatve māyāsvabhāvatve'pi jagato jñāte kathaṃ kleśo nivartate,
SA11n1106:1347: kimatra prahāṇānupapattikāraṇaṃ yat pṛcchasītyāha yadā māyetyādi-
SA11n1106:1349: idamatra prahāṇānupapattibījaṃ dṛśyate-yadā māyāstriyāṃ māyākāravinirmitāyāmabalāyāṃ rāgaḥ saṃraktacittatā jāyate utpadyate |
SA11n1106:1354: kiṃ tu tasyā māyāstriyāḥ kartuḥ nirmāturapi jāyate iti apiśabdārthaḥ |
SA11n1106:1355: yadā hi paracittavibhramasaṃpādanārthaṃ mantrauṣadhisāmarthyavinirmitāṃ sarvāṅgapratyaṅgāvayavalakṣaṇaparipūrṇāmabhinavayauvanaśobhāsaṃpatsamāpannāṃ prasannamanoharavarṇāṃ lāvaṇyātiśayaśālinīm atīva tadākāranirmāṇapravīṇaḥ kaścinmāyākāro janapadakalyāṇīṃ striyamupadarśayati,
SA11n1106:1356: tadā na tāvat tadanye tāmabhisamīkṣya manmathaśaraprahārāntaravyathitacetaso jāyante,
SA11n1106:1357: api tu yo'pi sa tasyāḥ kamanīyakāntisaṃpadaḥ kāmakalākauśalotkaṇṭhitamūrterabhinirmātā,
SA11n1106:1359: so'pi kāmakalayā paramadaśāmāsādayan na kathaṃcidapi cetaḥ saṃdhārayitumalam,
SA11n1106:1360: tat kathaṃ māyopamatve'pi niścite saṃsārasaṃtaticchedaḥ syāt ?
SA11n1106:1375: tasyāpi advayatattvasya sattve'pi āgantukasaṃkleśavāsanāyā aprahīṇatvāt na sarve tathāgatā bhavanti |
SA11n1106:1379: asmākaṃ tu niḥsvabhāvameva janyaṃ janakaṃ ceti na samānam |
SA11n1106:1387: durbalā śūnyavāsaneti śūnyasya śūnyatattvasya śūnyatāyā veti vigrahaḥ |
SA11n1106:1388: chandonurodhād bhāvapratyayasya lopaṃ kṛtvā śūnyeti nirdeśaḥ |
SA11n1106:1393: kathaṃ tarhi sā nivartate ityāha śūnyatetyādi-
SA11n1106:1395: śūnyatāyā māyāsvabhāvaniḥsvabhāvatāyā vāsanā tasya ādhānam āvedhaḥ |
SA11n1106:1403: nanu bhāvābhiniveśo vā śūnyatābhiniveśo vā iti nābhiniveśaṃ prati kaścidviśeṣaḥ,
SA11n1106:1413: ityevaṃ cābhyāsāt bhāvavāsanāprahāṇasya paścāt sāpi śūnyavāsanāpi prahīyate nivartate |
SA11n1106:1415: adhigate ca upeye paścāt kolopamatvāt upāyasyāpi prahāṇamanuṣṭhīyate | etadevāha-
SA11n1106:1420: syādetat-yadi nāma kiṃcinnāstīti manasikārābhyāsād bhavati śūnyatāvāsanāyāḥ prahāṇam,
SA11n1106:1422: tataśca gaṇḍapraveśe'kṣitārānirgamo jāta iti tadavasthaṃ tava dauṣṭhayam,
SA11n1106:1424: yadā na labhyate bhāvo yo nāstīti prakalpyate |
SA11n1106:1429: sa yadi vicāryamāṇo niḥsvabhāvatayā na labhyate na prāpyate taimirikopalabdhakeśastabakavat |
SA11n1106:1432: tasya saṃbandhino'bhāvāt nirālambaḥ abhāvaḥ kalpanāvidarśitamūrtiḥ kathaṃ tiṣṭhenmateḥ puraḥ,
SA11n1106:1436: tatpratiṣedhābhāvādabhāvābhiniveśastu kena vāryate ityata āha-yadā na labhyate ityādi |
SA11n1106:1442: ata eva etatsamastakalpanājālavinivartanāya bhagavatyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ vistareṇa adhyātmaśūnyatādayo'ṣṭādaśa śūnyatāḥ proktāḥ |
SA11n1106:1445: anyathā śūnyatāyā bhāvād vyatireke dharmāṇāṃ niḥsvabhāvatā na syāt |
SA11n1106:1448: punaraparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktairmanasikārairevaṃ pratyavekṣate-na rūpaśūnyatayā rūpaṃ śūnyam,
SA11n1106:1464: yaḥ pratītyasamutpādaḥ śūnyatā saiva te matā |
SA11n1106:1469: evaṃ sarvavikalpapratyastamayāt samastāvaraṇanirmuktirupajāyate ityupadarśayannāha yadā na bhāva ityādi-
SA11n1106:1470: yadā na bhāvo nābhāvo mateḥ saṃtiṣṭhate puraḥ |
SA11n1106:1472: yadā na bhāvaḥ paramārthasatsvabhāvo materbuddheḥ saṃtiṣṭhate puro'grataḥ,
SA11n1106:1474: nāpi bhāvavirahitalakṣaṇo'bhāvaḥ yadā mateḥ saṃtiṣṭhate puraḥ,
SA11n1106:1477: ābhyāmavyatiriktatayā anayoḥ saṃgrahe tāvapi saṃgṛhītāviti nirāśrayā,
SA11n1106:1480: kathaṃ tarhi sakalakalpanāvirahādanekakalpāsaṃkhyeyābhilaṣitaṃ parārthasaṃpadupāyabhūtaṃ buddhatvamadhigamya parārthamabhisaṃpādayati bhagavānityatrāha cintāmaṇiriti-
SA11n1106:1485: sa yathā vikalpamantareṇāpi lokānāṃ yathābhavyamicchāyāḥ paripūraṇaḥ abhilāṣasya saṃpādakaḥ |
SA11n1106:1489: jinasya buddhasya bhagavataḥ bimbaṃ dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇairvirājitaṃ śarīram |
SA11n1106:1490: tathā tena prakāreṇa īkṣyate sarvakalpanābhāve'pi parahitasukhasaṃpādanasamarthaṃ pratīyate |
SA11n1106:1495: yatpūrvaṃ bodhisattvāvasthāyāmanekaprakāraṃ bhagavatā sattvārthasaṃpādanaṃ praṇihitaṃ tasyākṣepavaśāt,
SA11n1106:1497: yasyāṃ rātrau tathāgato'bhisaṃbuddho yasyāṃ ca parinirvṛtaḥ,
SA11n1106:1513: evamasādhāraṇaṃ kāraṇamākhyāya punaranyathā hetvavasthāyā eva sa tādṛśaḥ prabhāvāti-śayaviśeṣo yadanābhogena parārthasaṃpādanasamarthaphalamupajāyate iti vṛttadvayenopadarśayannāha yathā gāruḍika ityādi-
SA11n1106:1516: yathā gāruḍiko viṣatatvavit labdhamantrasāmarthyaḥ stambhaṃ kāṣṭhamayaṃ vā anyadvā sādhayitvā mantreṇābhisaṃskṛtya mamābhāvādayameva sarvaviṣāpahāracaturo bhaviṣyatīti vinaśyati,
SA11n1106:1518: sa stambhaḥ tenābhimantritaḥ tasmin gāruḍike ciranaṣṭe'pi prabhūtakālamuparate'pi viṣādīnupaśāmayet,
SA11n1106:1520: chāndasasamayaṃ paripālayatā mito'pi upadhāyā ṇici hrasvo na kṛtaḥ |
SA11n1106:1532: dharmato buddhā draṣṭavyā dharmakāyā hi nāyakāḥ |
SA11n1106:1533: dharmatā cāpyavijñeyā na sā śakyā vijānitum ||iti |
SA11n1106:1543: iti ubhayathāpi sarvathā kalpanāvirahe'pi sattvārthasaṃpādanamavikalamupadarśitaṃ bhavati ||
SA11n1106:1545: kathaṃ tarhi tathāgatapūjā mahāphalā varṇyate ityāśaṅkayannāha acittake ityādi-
SA11n1106:1546: acittake kṛtā pūjā kathaṃ phalavatī bhavet |
SA11n1106:1547: saṃvṛticittavivikte bhagavati kṛtā upahṛtā pūjā kārāviśeṣaḥ kathaṃ phalavatī bhavet,
SA11n1106:1549: tatra asatyupabhoktari dāyakadānapatīnāṃ kathaṃ puṇyaṃ bhavet ?
SA11n1106:1554: yasmāt tiṣṭhato nirvṛtasya ca tasmāt phalavatī bhavediti yojanīyam |
SA11n1106:1556: nirvṛtasya nirupadhinirvāṇaṃ gatasya pūjāyā nāsti viśeṣaḥ |
SA11n1106:1561: tatra yadi nāma nirvṛte bhagavati pratigrahīturabhāvāt paribhogānvayaṃ na bhaviṣyati puṇyam,
SA11n1106:1564: kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇaṃ sati pratigrahītari bhavitavyaṃ puṇyena, nāsati ?
SA11n1106:1570: tathā vyatīte'pi guṇavati tadbhaktikṛtaṃ svacittādbhavat puṇyaṃ na virudhyate iti ||
SA11n1106:1571: api ca sarvapuṇyapāpasadbhāve sarveṣāmāgamaḥ sākṣītyāha āgamāccetyādi-
SA11n1106:1572: āgamācca phalaṃ tatra saṃvṛtyā tattvato'pi vā |
SA11n1106:1579: saṃvṛtyā tattvato'pi vā puṇyapāpakriyāyāḥ phalaṃ bhagavadāgamāt pratīyate,
SA11n1106:1580: tatra ca āvayoravivāda eva tatra idamuktaṃ bhagavatā puṣpakūṭadhāraṇyām-
SA11n1106:1581: ye kecit siṃhavikrīḍita tathāgatasya pūjāṃ kariṣyanti tiṣṭhato vā parinirvṛtasya vā,
SA11n1106:1583: yaśca khalu siṃhavikrīḍita tathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ dṛṣṭvā cittaṃ prasādayet,
SA11n1106:1584: prasannacittaḥ satkuryāt gurukuryāt mānayet pūjayet upacaret,
SA11n1106:1586: yaśca parinirvṛtasya tathāgatasya sarṣapaphalamātradhātau śarīrapūjāṃ kuryāt,
SA11n1106:1588: tathā pūjāyai nāsti viśeṣo nānākaraṇaṃ ca | iti ||
SA11n1106:1594: yaśca khalu punaḥ siṃhavikrīḍita tathāgataṃ varṣaśataṃ vā varṣasahasraṃ vā sarvasukhopadhānenopatiṣṭhet,
SA11n1106:1602: ekakramapadavyatihāraṃ vā atikramya vācaṃ bhāṣeta-namastamai buddhāya bhagavate iti,
SA11n1106:1603: mā te atra siṃhavikrīḍita kāṅkṣā vā vimatirvā vicikitsā vā,
SA11n1106:1604: yadasau kalpaṃ vā kalpaśataṃ vā kalpasahasraṃ vā durgativinipātaṃ gacchet,
SA11n1106:1607: satyabuddhe kṛtā pūjā saphaleti kathaṃ yathā ||40 ||
SA11n1106:1608: satyabuddhe paramārthasati bhagavati kṛtā pūjā saphaleti phalavatī,
SA11n1106:1614: tatra vaibhāṣikādayaḥ sarvadharmaśūnyatāyāḥ sarvāvaraṇaprahāṇamasahamānāḥ caturāryasatyadarśanabhāvanāṃ ca tadupāyamicchantaḥ prāhuḥ satyadarśanata ityādi-
SA11n1106:1622: tatra vṛttasthasya śrutacintāvato bhāvanāyāṃ pravṛttasya aśubhānāpānasmṛtismṛtyupasthānabhāvanā niṣpattikrameṇa anityato duḥkhata śūnyato'nātmataśca ityetaiḥ ṣoḍaśabhirākāraiḥ duḥkhādisatyaṃ paśyataḥ uṣmagatādicaturnirvedhabhāgīyadvāreṇa duḥkhe dharmajñānakṣāntyādipañcadaśakṣaṇalakṣaṇasya darśanamārgasya,
SA11n1106:1637: tathā hi-sarva eva hi bhāvā āropitamanāropitaṃ ceti rūpadvayamudvahanti |
SA11n1106:1642: tacca prajñayā vivecyamānaṃ sarvadharmānupalambhalakṣaṇamavasitamiti sarvadharmaśūnyataiva sarvāvaraṇavibhramaprahāṇāya paṭīyasītyavagamyate |
SA11n1106:1649: bhagavānāha-iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran rūpaṃ bhāva iti na bhāvayati |
SA11n1106:1653: yāvat mārgākārajñatāṃ bhāva iti na bhāvayati |
SA11n1106:1654: yāvat sarvākārajñatāṃ bhāva iti na bhāvayati |
SA11n1106:1663: tathā hi sa bhāvaḥ eṣo'hamiti dvayorantayoḥ saktaḥ |
SA11n1106:1664: dāne śīle kṣāntau vīrye dhyāne prajñāyām |
SA11n1106:1686: ye'pi te bhaviṣyanti anāgate'dhvani tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ,
SA11n1106:1688: ye'pi te etarhi daśadiglokadhātuṣu aprameyāsaṃkhyeyeṣu tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāstiṣṭhanti,
SA11n1106:1692: ye'pi te bhaviṣyanti anāgatānāṃ tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ śrāvakāḥ,
SA11n1106:1693: ye'pi te etarhi pratyutpannānāṃ tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ śrāvakāḥ,
SA11n1106:1697: atra prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sarvāṇi trīṇi yānāni vistareṇopadiṣṭāni |
SA11n1106:1698: tāni punaranimittayogena anupalambhayogena anutpādayogena asaṃkleśayogena avyavadānayogena,
SA11n1106:1714: kathaṃ kena prakāreṇa tvadīyāgamo bhagavadvacanamiti siddhaḥ ?
SA11n1106:1718: yasmāt kāraṇāt ubhayasya tava mama ca siddhaḥ āgamatvena niścito'sau mamāgamaḥ |
SA11n1106:1719: na hi madāgame bhavato'pi mahāyānānuyāyino buddhavacanatvena vipratipattirasti,
SA11n1106:1725: iti | yadyapi ubhayasiddhatvaṃ tvadāgamasya āgamasiddhau hetuḥ,
SA11n1106:1728: yasmāt tavaiva tāvadasau tvadāgamaḥ na siddhaḥ |
SA11n1106:1730: na hi abhyupagamāt prāk tava kathaṃcidapyasau siddhaḥ,
SA11n1106:1733: idaṃ tarhi sādhanamastu-yad guruśiṣyaparaṃparayā āmrāyāyātaṃ buddhavacanatvena,
SA11n1106:1739: yatpratyayā ca tatrāsthā mahāyāne'pi tāṃ kuru |
SA11n1106:1745: tāṃ tatpratyayāmāsthām iha mahāyāne'pi kuru vidhehi |
SA11n1106:1748: api tu maitreya caturbhiḥ kāraṇaiḥ pratibhānaṃ sarvabuddhabhāṣitaṃ veditavyam |
SA11n1106:1756: yasya kasyacinmaitreya etaiścaturbhiḥ pratibhāti pratibhāsyati vā,
SA11n1106:1757: tatra śrāddhaiḥ kulaputraiḥ kuladuhitṛbhirvā buddhasaṃjñā utpādayitavyā |
SA11n1106:1762: tatra maitreya ya imāni pratibhānāni pratikṣipet-naitāni buddhabhāṣitānīti,
SA11n1106:1764: pudgalavidveṣeṇa tena sarvaṃ buddhabhāṣitaṃ pratibhānaṃ pratikṣiptaṃ bhavati |
SA11n1106:1765: dharmaṃ pratikṣipya dharmavyasanasaṃvartanīyena karmaṇā apāyagāmī bhavati ||
SA11n1106:1766: tadatra dharmatāyā avilomanameva samyaglakṣaṇamuktam | uktaṃ ca-
SA11n1106:1775: kiṃ tarhi āvābhyāmanyeṣāmubhayeṣāṃ madāgamaḥ siddha ityupādeyaḥ,
SA11n1106:1780: yadi āvayorvivādārūḍhatvāt āvābhyāmanye ye kecidapratipannā ubhaye,
SA11n1106:1783: tasya satyatve yathārthatve abhyupagamyamāne sati vedāderapi satyatā vedavākyasya codanālakṣaṇasya |
SA11n1106:1791: tena sa upādeyo netaradityāśaṅkayannāha savivādaṃ mahāyānamityādi-
SA11n1106:1806: tatra ekasyaiva nikāyasya anekabhedasaṃbhavāt svayūthyairapi parasparavivādaḥ saṃbhavati |
SA11n1106:1813: tvadāgamasyāpi aparāpekṣayā savivādatvaṃ samānamiti parityāge tulya eva nyāyaḥ |
SA11n1106:1815: svairiti ekabhedavyavasthitaiḥ sautrāntikābhidharmikavainayikaiḥ parasparaṃ savivādatvāt sūtrābhidharmavinayāḥ parityāgamarhanti |
SA11n1106:1823: na ca sūtrābhidharmavinayānāṃ parasparamekavākyatā bhavataḥ saṃbhavati |
SA11n1106:1839: yathā kila dṛḍhamūlo vṛkṣaḥ ciramavasthitimanubhavan kāṇḍaśākhāpraśākhāpatrapuṣpaphalacchāyādānasaṃtāpādyapaharaṇasamartho bhavati,
SA11n1106:1854: sā ca āryasatyadarśanato na saṃgacchate ityāha-bhikṣutaiva cetyādi |
SA11n1106:1864: tattādṛśaṃ cittaṃ yeṣāṃ yogināṃ te tathoktāḥ, teṣāmiti |
SA11n1106:1865: yataḥ te duḥkhādisatyaṃ kleśavisaṃyogaṃ ca vastutvenāvalambante iti mataṃ bhavatām |
SA11n1106:1888: yāvacca saṃkleśāḥ tāvat karmanirmitajanmaparaṃparāprasavaḥ saṃsāro'pi sutarāmavyāhataprasaraḥ pravartate |
SA11n1106:1904: tadā tadanantaraṃ kleśaprahāṇāt samanantaramevāstu sā muktirbhavastu |
SA11n1106:1909: dṛṣṭaṃ ca teṣu sāmarthyaṃ niṣkleśasyāpi karmaṇaḥ ||46 ||
