SA11n1106:2594: tadyathā kṣitibījādayaḥ parasparopasarpaṇapratyayaviśeṣāt samadhigatātiśayatayā prathamakṣaṇopanipātinaḥ svopādeyabhūtadvitīyakṣaṇakalāpe kāryotpādānuguṇaviśeṣotpādanadvāreṇa taduttarottaratāratamyamupajanayantaḥ saṃtatipariṇāmaviśeṣādantyakṣaṇalakṣaṇaṃ prakarṣaparyantamāsādayanto bījānurūpaśālikodravāṅkuramutpādayanti |
SA11n1106:2595: yathā ca lākṣārasaparibhāvitaṃ mātuluṅgādibījamuptaṃ tatsaṃskāraparaṃparāpravṛtteḥ tatpuṣpādiṣu raktatāmutpādayati,
SA11n1106:2596: na ca tatra kaścit pūrvāparakālayoreko'nugāmī samasti |
SA11n1106:2600: phalaṃ tatraiva badhnāti karpāse raktatā yathā ||iti |
SA11n1106:2601: tasmādyathā bījādiṣu ātmānamantareṇāpi pratiniyamena kāryaṃ tadutpattiśca krameṇa bhavati,
SA11n1106:2602: tathā prakṛte'pi paralokagāminamekaṃ vināpi kāryakāraṇabhāvasya niyāmakatvāt pratiniyatameva phalam,
SA11n1106:2603: kleśakarmābhisaṃskṛtasya saṃtānasya avicchedena pravartanāt paraloke phalapratilambho'bhidhīyate,
SA11n1106:2606: yathā ca satyevātmani sa na ghaṭate,
SA11n1106:2607: tathā sapracayamucyamānamativistaraṃ syāditi neha pratanyate || āha ca-
SA11n1106:2623: kārakastu nopalabhyate ya imān skandhān vijahāti,
SA11n1106:2629: etena bhagavataiva idaṃpratyayatāmātralakṣaṇaḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvo'pi darśita eva |
SA11n1106:2630: ayamapi ca saṃtānasyetyanena [saṃtāna eka ityanena] yathāvyavahāramanirūpitasvarūpaḥ sūcita eva,
SA11n1106:2636: dṛṣṭā śaktirmatā sā cetsaṃvṛtyāstu yathā tathā ||iti |
SA11n1106:2640: na ca atra smarturabhāve'pi kaścid vyāghātaḥ |
SA11n1106:2641: anubhūte hi vastuni vijñānasaṃtāne smṛtibījādhānāt kālāntareṇa saṃtatiparipākahetoḥ smaraṇaṃ nāma kāryamutpadyate |
SA11n1106:2643: ativistarabhayāt pratyekamiha na pratividhīyante iti tatsamarthanamanyatraiva vistareṇāvadhāryamiti ||
SA11n1106:2645: paramārthe tu sarvadharmāṇāṃ niḥsvabhāvatvāt sarvavikalpoparamācca na kiṃcidutpadyate vā nirudhyate vā sātmakamanātmakaṃ vā |
SA11n1106:2647: nāpi ihaloko na paraloko vā na kaścidasti,
SA11n1106:2649: tasmāt sarvametat pratibimbasaṃnibhaṃ niḥsvabhāvamutpadyate nirudhyate ca |
SA11n1106:2650: kāryakāraṇaṃ ca sātmakaṃ nirātmakaṃ ca nityamanityaṃ cābhidhīyate |
SA11n1106:2658: evaṃ na ca nirodho'sti na ca bhāvo'sti tattvataḥ |
SA11n1106:2665: na kartāsti na bhoktāsti puṇyāpuṇyaṃ pratītyajam |
SA11n1106:2666: yatpratītya na tajjātaṃ proktaṃ vācaspate tvayā ||iti |
SA11n1106:2672: bhagavānāha-evameva mahārāja bālo'śrutavān pṛthagjanaścakṣuṣā rūpāṇi dṛṣṭvā saumanasyasthānīyāni abhiniviśate |
SA11n1106:2678: tacca karmābhisaṃskṛtamādita eva kṣīṇaṃ niruddhaṃ vigataṃ vipariṇataṃ na pūrvāṃ diśaṃ niśritya tiṣṭhati,
SA11n1106:2688: tat punaḥ kālāntareṇa maraṇakālasamaye pratyupasthite jīvitendriyanirodhe āyuṣaḥ parikṣayāt tatsabhāgasya karmaṇaḥ kṣīṇatvāt caramavijñānasya nirudhyamānasya manasa ārambaṇībhavati |
SA11n1106:2690: iti hi mahārāja caramavijñānenādhipatinā tena ca karmārambaṇena aupapattyaṃśikaṃ dvayapratyayaṃ prathamaṃ vijñānamutpadyate |
SA11n1106:2697: tasya ca prathamavijñānasya aupapattyaṃśikasya samanantaraniruddhasya anantaraṃ sabhāgā cittasaṃtatiḥ pravartate,
SA11n1106:2703: iti mahārāja na kaściddharmo'smāllokāt paralokaṃ gacchati,
SA11n1106:2727: evamavidyāyāṃ satyāṃ trividhāḥ saṃskārā abhinirvartante puṇyopagāḥ,
SA11n1106:2739: yajjātīyaḥ sparśo bhavati tajjātīyā vedanā pravartate |
SA11n1106:2749: ātmapriyarūpasātarūpairviyogo mā bhavatviti aparityāgo bhūyo bhūyaśca prārthanā,
SA11n1106:2751: evaṃ prārthayamānaḥ punarbhavajanakaṃ karma samutthāpayatti kāyena vācā manasā,
SA11n1106:2766: tatra karmaṇāṃ naivaṃ bhavati-ahaṃ vijñānabījasya kṣetrakāryaṃ karomi |
SA11n1106:2767: tṛṣṇāyāṃ api naivaṃ bhavati- ahaṃ vijñānabījaṃ snehayāmīti |
SA11n1106:2770: api tu vijñānabījaṃ karmakṣetrapratiṣṭhitaṃ tṛṣṇāsnehābhisyanditam avidyāvakīrṇaṃ virohati,
SA11n1106:2772: sa ca nāmarūpāṅkuro na svayaṃkṛto na parakṛto nobhayakṛto neśvaranirmito na kālapariṇāmito na caikakāraṇādhīno nāpyahetusamutpannaḥ |
SA11n1106:2773: atha ca mātāpitṛsaṃyogādṛtusamavāyādanyeṣāṃ ca pratyayānāṃ samavāyādāsvādanānuprabaddhaṃ vijñānabījaṃ tatratatropapattyāyatanapratisaṃdhau mātuḥ kukṣau nāmarūpāṅkuramabhinirvartayati asvāmikeṣu dharmeṣu amameṣu aparigraheṣu apratyarthikeṣu ākāśasameṣu māyālakṣaṇasvabhāveṣu hetupratyayānāmavaikalyāt |
SA11n1106:2782: evameva karmakleśajanitaṃ vijñānabījaṃ tatratatropapattyāyatanapratisaṃdhau mātuḥ kukṣau nāmarūpāṅkuramabhinirvartayati asvāmikeṣu dharmeṣu amameṣu aparigraheṣu apratyarthikeṣu ākāśasameṣu māyālakṣaṇasvabhāveṣu hetupratyayānāmavaikalyāt |
SA11n1106:2794: na tu ya eva māraṇāntikāḥ skandhāḥ,
SA11n1106:2798: na ca pūrvaniruddheṣu māraṇāntikeṣu skandheṣu aupapattyaṃśikāḥ skandhāḥ prādurbhavanti,
SA11n1106:2801: tasminneva ca samaye aupapattyaṃśikāḥ skandhāḥ prādurbhavanti,
SA11n1106:2817: tadevamātmādivirahe'pi karmaphalasaṃbandho'vikalaḥ sūtreṣu bhagavatā svayamupadarśita ityupadarśitaṃ bhavati |
SA11n1106:2821: ātmā hi ātmano nāthaḥ ko nu nāthaḥ paro bhavet |
SA11n1106:2822: ātmanā hi sudāntena svargaṃ prāpnoti paṇḍitaḥ ||
SA11n1106:2827: cittasya damanaṃ sādhu cittaṃ dāntaṃ sukhāvaham |
SA11n1106:2830: tadapi ca ātmadṛṣṭayabhiniviṣṭānāmanyatrātmagrāhaparikalpavicchedārthaṃ neyārthatayā saṃvṛtyā cittamātmeti prakāśitaṃ na tu paramārthataḥ |
SA11n1106:2836: yataḥ tadapi ca anyatra pudgalādyabhiniveśabādhanāya vacanam |
SA11n1106:2841: tathāpi na vastutaḥ tadahaṃkāragocara ityupadarśayannāha atītetyādi-
SA11n1106:2842: atītānāgataṃ cittaṃ nāhaṃ taddhi na vidyate |
SA11n1106:2843: tridhā hi cittaṃ saṃbhavati parikalpamupādāya atītamanāgataṃ pratyutpannaṃ ca |
SA11n1106:2845: atītānāgataṃ naṣṭājātaṃ cittaṃ nāhaṃ na ahaṃdarśanaviṣayaḥ |
SA11n1106:2850: yadatītaṃ tat kṣīṇaṃ niruddhaṃ vigataṃ vipariṇāmitam |
SA11n1106:2853: pratyutpannaṃ tarhi cittamahaṃ bhaviṣya tītyata āha-
SA11n1106:2858: asmin pratyutpanne citte naṣṭe dvitīyakṣaṇe atīte sati nāstyahaṃ punaḥ,
SA11n1106:2862: ato na cittālambano'pīti nirālambana evāyamahaṃpratyaya utpadyate ||
SA11n1106:2865: nāpi cittamahaṃkārasya viṣaya iti prasādhyopasaṃharannāha yathaivetyādi-
SA11n1106:2869: bhāgaśaḥ pratyavayavaśaḥ kṛto'vadhūto na kaścit na vastusan prāpyate,
SA11n1106:2876: yadi sattvo na vidyeta kasyopari kṛpeti cet |
SA11n1106:2877: yadi sarvathaiva sattvaḥ ātmā pudgalo vā vicāryamāṇo na vidyeta,
SA11n1106:2879: tadā kasyopari kṛpā karuṇā bodhisattvānāṃ bhavet,
SA11n1106:2885: atha khalu āryāvalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantametadavocat-na bhagavan bodhisattvena atibahuṣu dharmeṣu śikṣitavyam |
SA11n1106:2886: eka eva dharmo bodhisattvena svārādhitaḥ kartavyaḥ supratibiddhaḥ |
SA11n1106:2890: evameva bhagavan yena bodhisattvasya mahākaruṇā gacchati,
SA11n1106:2892: tadyathā bhagavan jīvitendriye sati anyeṣāmindriyāṇāṃ pravṛttirbhavati,
SA11n1106:2893: evameva bhagavan mahākaruṇāyāṃ satyāṃ bodhikārakāṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ pravṛttirbhavatīti ||
SA11n1106:2899: tasmādavaśyaṃ prathamataḥ sattvālambanā karuṇābhyupagantavyāḥ duḥkhitasattvādhiṣṭhānena samutpatteḥ |
SA11n1106:2900: sattvābhāve ca sā na syāditi cet,
SA11n1106:2905: tadarthamabhyupetena svīkṛtena mohena saṃvṛtyā yaḥ prakalpitaḥ samāropitaḥ sattvaḥ,
SA11n1106:2907: tathāhi sakalakalpanājālarahitaṃ sarvāvaraṇavinirmuktaṃ paramapuruṣārthatayā buddhatvamiha sādhyam |
SA11n1106:2912: sā ca prathamato duḥkhitasattveṣu pravartamānā saṃbhārārambhanidānamupapadyate iti kāryārthaṃ mohasya saṃvṛtisatyarūpasyābhyupagamaḥ |
SA11n1106:2919: ye kecidbhikṣavaḥ śramaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā ātmeti samanupaśyantaḥ samanupaśyanti imānete (tān ?)
SA11n1106:2921: tato yadi nāma prajñayā nirūpayataḥ paramārthataḥ sattvānupalambhaḥ,
SA11n1106:2922: tathāpi saṃvṛtyā na niṣidhyate iti | taduktam-
SA11n1106:2923: yataḥ prajñā tattvaṃ bhajati karuṇā saṃvṛtimataḥ
SA11n1106:2926: tadā te'bhūdārte suta iva pituḥ prema jagati ||iti |
SA11n1106:2929: sattvasaṃjñā ca te nātha sarvathā na pravartate |
SA11n1106:2934: nanu paramārthataḥ sattvābhāve kasya tat kāryam,
SA11n1106:2935: iti kathaṃ tatsādhanāya kasyacit pravṛttirityabhisaṃdhāya āha kāryamityādi-
SA11n1106:2936: kāryaṃ kasya na cetsattvaḥ satyamīhā tu mohataḥ |
SA11n1106:2939: tadā ekasyānuyāyino'bhāvāt rūpādīnāṃ ca utpannavināśitvāt kāryaṃ kasya ?
SA11n1106:2942: evameva etanmatameva asmākam-naiva kasyacit paramārthataḥ kāryam,
SA11n1106:2944: yadyevam, kathaṃ tarhi tatsādhanāya prathamataḥ pravṛttiriti cet,
SA11n1106:2947: mamaiva tat kāryaṃ bhaviṣyatītyekatvādhyavasāyena sattvābhāve'pi saṃvṛtyā māyāsvabhāvatayā |
SA11n1106:2953: nanu ca moho nāma avidyāsvabhāvatayā sarvathaiva anupādeyaḥ |
SA11n1106:2954: tat kathaṃ punastasyaiva svīkāraḥ ityata āha duḥkhetyādi-
SA11n1106:2959: anyastu yaḥ paraṃparayā duḥkhavyupaśamārthaṃ sarvasattvajātyādivyasananimittaṃ kāryamohaḥ kāryasya paramārthasatyalakṣaṇasyādhigamāya mohaḥ,
SA11n1106:2971: etat kāryārthamavicārataḥ [9.4] ityasmin prastāve pratipāditameva pūrvam |
SA11n1106:2984: kiṃbhūtaḥ ? duḥkhahetuḥ duḥkhasya sāṃsārikasya triduḥkhatālakṣaṇasya hetuḥ kāraṇam |
SA11n1106:2989: tathāhi ātmānaṃ paśyataḥ saṃskṛteṣu skandhadhātvāyataneṣu ahamiti dṛḍhataramutpadyate snehaḥ |
SA11n1106:2990: tatastadduḥkhapratīkārecchayā sukhābhilāṣo doṣān pracchādya tadarthitayā guṇādhyāropāt tatsādhaneṣu pravartate |
SA11n1106:2992: ahaṃ mameti ca darśanāt paripanthini vidveṣaḥ |
SA11n1106:2993: tataḥ samastaduḥkhanidānaṃ sarva eva kleśopakleśā labdhaprasarāḥ pravartante |
SA11n1106:3001: anayoḥ saṃpratibaddhāḥ sarve doṣāḥ prajāyante || iti ||
SA11n1106:3004: tato'pi ātmadarśanādapi na nivartyo nivartayitumaśakyo'haṃkāraśced yadi, tadā-
SA11n1106:3012: tathāhi tadbhāvanāprakarṣaparyantagamanāt sākṣānnairātmyadarśanāt virodhi satkāyadarśanaṃ nivartate |
SA11n1106:3013: tannivṛttau ca ekasyānugāmino darśanābhāvāt pūrvāpararūpavikalasya kṣaṇamātrasya darśanam |
SA11n1106:3014: tataḥ pūrvāparasamāropābhāvāt na anāgatasukhasādhanaṃ kiṃcidātmanaḥ paśyati |
SA11n1106:3015: tato na tasya kvacidviṣaye rāgo jāyate,
SA11n1106:3021: na ca anyena kṛte'pakāre prekṣāvataḥ anyatra vairaniryātanamucitam,
SA11n1106:3023: evaṃ rāgādinivṛttau anye'pi tatprabhavāḥ kleśopakleśā notpadyante |
SA11n1106:3026: evaṃ hi pudgalaśūnyatāyāṃ satkāyadarśananivṛttau chinnamūlatvāt kleśā na samudācaranti |
SA11n1106:3028: tadyathāpi nāma śāntamate vṛkṣasya mūlacchinnasya sarvaśākhāpatrapalāśaṃ śuṣyati,
SA11n1106:3033: syādetatyadi nāma ātmā vicāreṇa kharaviṣāṇasadṛśatvānnāhaṃkārasya viṣayaḥ,
SA11n1106:3034: tathāpi kāyāvayavī tadviṣayo bhaviṣyatītyatrāha kāyo neti-
SA11n1106:3035: kāyo na pādau na jaṅghā norū kāyaḥ kaṭirna ca |
SA11n1106:3036: nodaraṃ nāpyayaṃ pṛṣṭhaṃ noro bāhū na cāpi saḥ ||79 ||
SA11n1106:3037: na hastau nāpyayaṃ pārśvau na kakṣau nāṃsalakṣaṇaḥ |
SA11n1106:3038: na grīvā na śiraḥ kāyaḥ kāyo'tra kataraḥ punaḥ ||80 ||
SA11n1106:3039: kāyo'pi vicāreṇaiko naiva kaścidastītyupadarśayati-tathā hi karacaraṇādayo bhāgā evaṃ paraṃ dṛśyante,
SA11n1106:3056: na kakṣau, bhujamūle api na kāyaḥ |
SA11n1106:3068: atra eṣu pādādibhāgeṣu purovartiṣu śarīrakalpanānimitteṣu kataraḥ kāyo bhavatu ?
SA11n1106:3069: naiva kaścideko'pi nirūpyamāṇaḥ kāyātmaka upalabhyate iti yāvat ||
SA11n1106:3071: kiṃ tarhi sarvāvayavavyāpakatvādavayavinaḥ sarvāvayaveṣu vartate ityatrāha yadītyādi-
SA11n1106:3075: tatra yadi sarveṣu karacaraṇādiṣu avayaveṣu kāyo'vayavī,
SA11n1106:3085: tasya avakāśābhāvādeva avayaveṣu na vṛttirityāha aṃśā ityādi-
SA11n1106:3086: aṃśā aṃśeṣu vartante sa ca kutra svayaṃ sthitaḥ ||81 ||
SA11n1106:3087: aṃśā bhāgāḥ aṃśeṣu svasvabhāgeṣu vartante vyavatiṣṭhante,
SA11n1106:3090: svayaṃ punarasau kāyo'vayavī kva nu nāma vyavasthitaḥ iti na vidmaḥ ||
SA11n1106:3096: avayaveṣu anavakāśatvāt sa ca kutra svayaṃ sthitaḥ iti prasaṅgo nādyāpi nivartate |
SA11n1106:3099: ādiśabdāccaraṇādiṣu sthitaḥ samavetaḥ kāyāvayavī cet yadi,
SA11n1106:3109: ayaṃ ca prasaṅgaḥ anekatra ekadeśena vṛttipakṣe'pi yojayitavyaḥ |
SA11n1106:3113: naivāntarna bahiḥ kāyaḥ kathaṃ kāyaḥ karādiṣu |
SA11n1106:3115: adhunā punaravayavinaḥ pratiṣedhāt na bahiḥ na bāhyaḥ pratyakṣādigocaraḥ kāyaḥ,
SA11n1106:3118: karādibhyaḥ pṛthaṅ nāsti kathaṃ nu khalu vidyate ||83 ||
SA11n1106:3119: karādibhyo'vayavebhyaḥ pṛthag bhinnaḥ upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptaḥ kāyo nāsti,
SA11n1106:3125: sa kāyaḥ kathaṃ nu khalu vidyate ?
SA11n1106:3126: kathaṃ nviti kathaṃcidapi kāyamanupalabhamānaḥ tatsattvamasaṃbhāvayan pṛcchati-kathaṃ nu kena prakāreṇa |
SA11n1106:3136: mohādavidyāvaśāt tu punaḥ kāyabuddhiḥ karādiṣu ekadravyarahiteṣu,
SA11n1106:3142: kathamanyatra sā na bhavati ityatrāha saṃniveśeti-
SA11n1106:3150: yathā sthāṇau puruṣasvabhāvarahite'pi puruṣasādhāraṇordhvatādisaṃniveśaviśeṣamupalabdhavato dūrādavivecitaparaviśeṣasya kasyacit vibhramāt puruṣabuddhirupajāyate,
SA11n1106:3155: yāvat yāvatkālāvadhiparicchinnā pratyayānāṃ kāraṇānāṃ pṛthivyādiṣaḍdhātuṣaṭsparśāyatanāṣṭādaśamanopavicārātmakānāṃ karmāyattavṛttīnāṃ sāmagrī samavadhānam,
SA11n1106:3157: yathā puruṣasvabhāvavirahito'pi paramārthataḥ parikalpitarūpatayā puruṣa iva pratibhāsate vyavahriyate |
SA11n1106:3160: na pūrvaṃ kalalādyavasthāyāṃ na paścādvikalitatvād bhasmādyavasthāyāṃ nijasvabhāvābhāvāt |
SA11n1106:3165: evaṃ tathā karādau yāvat sā pratyayasāmagrī,
SA11n1106:3172: ayamatra samudāyārthaḥtattatpratyayasāmagrīsadbhāve tattadvastusvabhāvamantareṇāpi abhūtaṃ tattvamādarśayantī bhrāntivaśādasau kalpanā upajāyate |
SA11n1106:3175: ato nāyaṃ kāyādivyavahāro vāstava iti vakṣyati | taduktam-
SA11n1106:3179: anirdeśyaḥ svataḥ prāptaḥ kāya ityucyate katham ||iti |
SA11n1106:3190: tāvat kāyo'tra karādau dṛśyate, na paścāt |
SA11n1106:3193: karacaraṇādayaḥ punaravayavāḥ pratyakśopalabdhatvāt pratiṣeddhumaśakyāḥ ityāśaṅkaya karādayo'pi parikalpitasvabhāvā evetyupadarśayitumāha evamaṅgulītyādi-
SA11n1106:3208: parvaṇāmaṅgulibhāgānāṃ samūhatvāt saṃghātatvāt kataro bhavediti prakṛtena saṃbandhaḥ |
SA11n1106:3214: iti | aṃśāḥ parvabhāgāḥ api aṇubhedena paramāṇuśo vibhāgena bhidyamānatvāt kalpitā eva |
SA11n1106:3219: dikṣu vā vibhāgāḥ nānādigavasthitā nānārūpāṃśāḥ paramāṇoḥ,
SA11n1106:3223: iti nyāyāt | tathāhi-pūrvāparādidigavasthitaparamāṇvabhimukhaṃ yat tat paramāṇormadhyavartino rūpam,
SA11n1106:3231: tasyāpi pūrvadigavasthitasya paramāṇoraparaparamāṇunā sarvātmanā saṃbandhena tatsvarūpāntarbhāvāt paramāṇumātraṃ dravyaṃ syāt |
SA11n1106:3232: tathā ca sati pracayarūpā bhūdharādayo na syuḥ |
SA11n1106:3233: ato bhavanādīnāṃ pracayamicchatā dvitīya eva pakṣaḥ samabhyupeyaḥ |
SA11n1106:3234: tadā ca ṣaḍbhiraparāpararūpeṇa yugapat saṃbandhāt ṣaḍbhāgo madhyaparamāṇuḥ syāt,
SA11n1106:3241: te'pi punaraṇīyāṃso bhāgāḥ tathaiva nirūpyamāṇāḥ nirātmatayā nabhaḥsvabhāvatāṃ pratipadyante ityāha digvibhāgo'pītyādi-
SA11n1106:3243: digvibhāgo'pi digbhedena paramāṇorvibhāgo'pi pūrvavat ṣaḍaṃśatayā bhidyamānaḥ kataro bhavet ?
SA11n1106:3250: evaṃ karādayo'pi vicārato niḥsvabhāvā draṣṭavyā iti |
SA11n1106:3256: na ca kāyaḥ ahaṃkārasya viṣayo vastutaḥ |
SA11n1106:3257: tasmādavidyāsamutthāpitātmatayā ātmādisattvamantareṇāpi pravartamāno'yamahamiti pratyayo nirviṣaya eva samutpadyate |
SA11n1106:3263: punaraparaṃ kulaputra bodhisattva evaṃ kāyasmṛtimupasthāpayati-ayaṃ kāyaḥ pādapādāṅulijaṅghorutrikodaranābhīpṛṣṭhavaṃśahṛdayapārśvapārśukāhastakalācībāhvaṅgagrīvāhanulalāṭaśiraḥkapāla-mātrasamūhaḥ karmabhavakārakopacitaḥ nānākleśopakleśasaṃkalpavikalpaśatasahasrāṇāmāvāsaḥ |
SA11n1106:3270: tasya kāyaparijñānahetorna bhūyaḥ kvacit smṛtiḥ prasarati,
SA11n1106:3274: ayaṃ kāyo na pūrvāntādāgato nāparānte saṃkrānto na pūrvāntāparāntāvasthito'nyatrāsadviparyāsasaṃbhūtaḥ kārakavedakarahito nādyantamadhye pratiṣṭhitamūlaḥ,
SA11n1106:3276: āgantukairvyavahārairvyavahriyate kāya iti deha iti bhoga iti āśraya iti kuṇapa iti āyatanamiti |
SA11n1106:3277: asārako'yaṃ kāyaḥ mātāpitṛśukraśoṇitasaṃbhūtaḥ aśucipūtidurgandhisvabhāvaḥ rāgadoṣamohaviṣādataskarākulaḥ nityaṃ śatanapatanabhedanavikiraṇaviṃdhvaṃsanadharmā nānāvyādhiśatasahasranīḍa iti ||
SA11n1106:3278: evaṃ yadā vicāryamāṇo vastutaḥ śūnyasvabhāvatayā ākāśasaṃkāśaḥ sarvathā kāyaḥ,
SA11n1106:3279: tadā mithyaiva vastutattvamāropya rāgādikamutpādayantaḥ saṃsāramupabṛṃhayanti bālāḥ ityāhaevamityādi-
SA11n1106:3280: evaṃ svapnopame rūpe ko rajyeta vicārakaḥ |
SA11n1106:3281: evamityuktakrameṇa svapnopame svapnopalabdhe iva rūpe'saumanasyasthānīye ko rajyeta,
SA11n1106:3286: tadyathā-saumanasyasthānīyāni cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi dṛṣṭvā rāgo jāyate |
SA11n1106:3287: daurmanasyasthānīyāni cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi dṛṣṭvā dveṣo jāyate |
SA11n1106:3288: upekṣāsthānīyāni cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi dṛṣṭvā moho jāyate iti |
SA11n1106:3297: iti hi atyantayā cakṣurāyatanaṃ śūnyaṃ cakṣurāyatanasvabhāvena tat pūrvāntato'pi nopalabhyate,
SA11n1106:3303: iti hi māyopamānīndriyāṇi svapnopamān viṣayān paśyati,
SA11n1106:3307: evametadyathābhūtaṃ samyak prajñayā paśyan ko rajyeta dveṣṭi muhyati vā ?
SA11n1106:3309: kāyābhāve ca strāyādikalpanayāpi rāgo na yukta ityāha kāyaścetyādi-
SA11n1106:3310: kāyaścaivaṃ yadā nāsti tadā kā strī pumāṃśca kaḥ ||88 ||
SA11n1106:3315: tadā kāyābhāvāt kā strī kāminī yasyāḥ kamanīyatayā puruṣe rāgo bhavet ?
SA11n1106:3316: kaśca pumān kāmukaḥ yasya rañjanīyatayā striyāṃ rāgo bhavet ?
SA11n1106:3317: strī hi svātmani strīti saṃkalpya bahirdhā puruṣe puruṣa iti rāgaṃ janayati |
SA11n1106:3318: evaṃ puruṣo'pi svātmani puruṣa iti saṃkalpya bahirdhā striyāṃ strīti rāgaṃ janayati |
SA11n1106:3319: kāyābhāve tu striyāṃ strīti na saṃvidyate,
SA11n1106:3322: na tat strī na puruṣa iti |
SA11n1106:3323: tasmādasati kāye stryādikalpanākṛto'pi na yujyate rāgaḥ |
SA11n1106:3333: ṣaḍdhāturayaṃ mahārāja puruṣa iti khalu punaretad yuktam |
SA11n1106:3345: cakṣuḥsparśāyatanaṃ rūpāṇāṃ darśanāya yāvanmanaḥsparśāyatanaṃ dharmāṇāṃ vijñānāya |
SA11n1106:3350: iha puruṣaḥ cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi dṛṣṭvā saumanasyadaurmanasyopekṣāsthānīyāni rūpāṇyupavicarati |
SA11n1106:3361: tatra mahārāja ādhyātmikaḥ pṛthvīdhātuḥ utpadyamāno na kutaścidāgacchati,
SA11n1106:3363: bhavati mahārāja samayo'yaṃ yat strī adhyātmaṃ [ahaṃ] strīti kalpayati |
SA11n1106:3364: sā adhyātmamahaṃ strīti kalpayitvā bahirdhā puruṣaṃ puruṣa iti kalpayati |
SA11n1106:3365: sā bahirdhā puruṣaṃ puruṣa iti kalpayitvā saṃraktā satī bahirdhā puruṣeṇa sārdhaṃ saṃyogamākāṅkṣate |
SA11n1106:3381: iti hi mahārāja saṃkalpaṃ jñātvā kakkhaṭatvaṃ veditavyaṃ yathā kakkhaṭatvamutpadyamānaṃ na kutaścidāgacchatīti |
SA11n1106:3384: tasya tat kakkhaṭatvaṃ saṃklidyamānaṃ saṃnirudhyamānaṃ na pūrvāṃ diśaṃ gacchati,
SA11n1106:3396: iti hi mahārāja pṛthivīdhātuḥ pṛthivīdhātutvena nopalabhyate,
SA11n1106:3398: so'pi vyavahāro na strī na puruṣaḥ |
SA11n1106:3399: evaṃ mahārāja yathābhūtaṃ samyak prajñayā draṣṭavyamiti |
SA11n1106:3404: evaṃ kāyasmṛtyupasthānaṃ pratipādya vedanāsmṛtyupasthānamupadarśayituṃ vedanāṃ vicārayannāha yadyastītyādi-
SA11n1106:3405: yadyasti duḥkhaṃ tattvena prahṛṣṭān kiṃ na vādhate |
SA11n1106:3406: śokādyārtāya mṛṣṭādi sukhaṃ cetkiṃ na rocate ||89 ||
SA11n1106:3425: na hi vastu satsvabhāvaṃ kadācidapi nivartitumutsahate |
SA11n1106:3427: yaduktaṃ prahṛṣṭān kiṃ na bādhate iti,
SA11n1106:3431: kiṃ tarhi samudbhūtavartinā sukhena tiraskṛtatvāt vidyamānamapi nānubhūyate,
SA11n1106:3433: sadapi yadi tadduḥkhaṃ nānubhūyate na vedyate ityucyate,
SA11n1106:3436: vedanātvaṃ vedanāsvabhāvatvaṃ kathaṃ kena prakāreṇa tasyāvyaktasya sukhasya yasya nānubhavātmatā nānubhūyamānasvabhāvatā |
SA11n1106:3442: kiṃ tu sūkṣmatayā anubhūtamapi ananubhūtakalpamityatrāha astītyādi-
SA11n1106:3443: asti sūkṣmatayā duḥkhaṃ sthaulyaṃ tasya hṛtaṃ nanu |
SA11n1106:3448: prahṛṣṭāvasthāyāṃ pravṛttena balavatā sukhena sthaulyaṃ prābalyamasya duḥkhasya hatamabhibhūtam |
SA11n1106:3451: na hi sūkṣmatā nāma duḥkhasya sātānubhavakāle kācidupalabhyate |
SA11n1106:3453: atha tuṣṭimātrā aparā tasmādeva udbhūtavṛtteḥ sukhāt,
SA11n1106:3454: aparā tuṣṭimātrā dvitīyā sukhamātrā alpīyasī sukhakaṇikā syāt,
SA11n1106:3457: nanu sāpyasya sūkṣmatā sāpi tuṣṭimātrā aparā,
SA11n1106:3461: iti duḥkhasya sūkṣmatā avedyasvabhāvā sukhānubhavakāle nāstyeveti niścitam ||
SA11n1106:3463: kiṃ tarhi kāraṇavaikalyāt kadācinnopalabhyate ityatrāha viruddhetyādi-
SA11n1106:3465: duḥkhena viruddhasya sukhasya yaḥ pratyayo hetuḥ sparśaḥ,
SA11n1106:3471: tasyotpattau satyāṃ prahṛṣṭāvasthāyāṃ hetuvaikalyāt duḥkhasyānudayo duḥkhasyānutpattiśceducyate, tadā-
SA11n1106:3477: sa eva vedanā sukhā duḥkhā taditarā vā |
SA11n1106:3492: vedanā abhiniveśasvabhāvatvādeva ca vicāreṇa nivartayituṃ śakyate ityāha ata evetyādi-
SA11n1106:3494: ata eveti | yata eva abhiniveśasvabhāvā vedanā,
SA11n1106:3495: ata eva vicāro'yaṃ vimarśo'yaṃ pratipakṣo virodhī,
SA11n1106:3503: tasmin saṃbhūtaṃ jātaṃ dhyānaṃ viviktaṃ kāmaiḥ,
SA11n1106:3504: viviktaṃ pāpakairakuśalairdharmaiḥ savitarkaṃ savicāraṃ samādhijaṃ prītisukhamityādi |
SA11n1106:3511: sāṃprataṃ hetvanabhisaṃbhavādeva na vedanā vastusatī yuktetyāha sāntarāvityādi-
SA11n1106:3515: sparśāḥ ṣaṭ saṃnipātajāḥ [abhi. ko.-3.30] iti vacanāt |
SA11n1106:3516: sa trikasaṃnipātajaḥ sparśa eva na ghaṭate,
SA11n1106:3520: tadā saṃsargaḥ saṃnipāto melanaṃ kutaḥ kasmāt etayorindriyārthayoḥ ?
SA11n1106:3523: vyavadhāne sati sa kathaṃ bhavet iti bhāvaḥ |
SA11n1106:3525: so'pi na yujyate ityāha nirantaratve ityādi-
SA11n1106:3528: evaṃ hi tayoḥ sarvātmanā nairantaryaṃ bhavet yadi aṇīyasāpi nāṃśena vyavadhānaṃ syāt sadharmatā ca |
SA11n1106:3531: ekatve sati bhedābhāvāt kiṃ kena saṃgataṃ syāt ?
SA11n1106:3536: tatra ca saṃsargadūṣaṇe na kiṃciddūṣyate ityāha nāṇorityādi-
SA11n1106:3548: tāvatā siddhaṃ naḥ sādhyamityāha apraveśa iti-
SA11n1106:3552: tathā ca tatsvarūpaṃ svātmanā vyāpnuvata eva tena saṃgatiḥ |
SA11n1106:3554: tacca miśratvaṃ tatra praveśamantareṇa na bhavet |
SA11n1106:3555: itthamapraveśe praveśābhāve sati na miśratvaṃ nāsaṃbhinnarūpatvam |
SA11n1106:3556: amiśratve miśratvābhāve ca na saṃgatiḥ nāsaṅgaḥ ||
SA11n1106:3557: niraṃśasya sarvathaiva saṃsargo na yujyate ityāha niraṃśasya cetyādi-
SA11n1106:3566: tasya amūrtasya aṃśābhāve asattvameva prāptamiti bhāvaḥ |
SA11n1106:3567: na caitad bhavato'pi pramāṇapratītaṃ kvacidastītyāha saṃsarga ityādi-
SA11n1106:3568: saṃsarge ca niraṃśatvaṃ yadi dṛṣṭaṃ nidarśaya ||96 ||
SA11n1106:3582: iti trayāṇāmapi saṃsargamavadhūya saṃprati samūha eva vastusan nāsti iti pratipādayannāha samūhasyāpītyādi-
SA11n1106:3586: avastutvāt vasturahitatvāt aśvaviuṣāṇavat saṃsargo naiva yujyate iti prakṛtena saṃbandhaḥ |
SA11n1106:3594: tasmādevaṃ pratipāditakrameṇa sparśanābhāve trikasaṃparkābhāve vedanāsaṃbhavaḥ kutaḥ,
SA11n1106:3605: vedanāyā vicāreṇa niḥsvabhāvatvād bādhā avicārataḥ ātmādeḥ pūrvanirastatvādvedakābhāvaḥ |
SA11n1106:3611: saṃprati vedanābhāvāt tatpratyayā tṛṣṇāpi kāraṇavirahāt paramārthato notpādamarhatītyupadarśayitumāha yadā netyādi-
SA11n1106:3612: yadā na vedakaḥ kaścidvedanā ca na vidyate |
SA11n1106:3613: tadāvasthāmimāṃ dṛṣṭvā tṛṣṇe kiṃ na vidīryase ||99 ||
SA11n1106:3617: tadā avasthāmimāṃ evaṃvidhāṃ svajanmavikalāṃ dṛṣṭvā upalabhya tṛṣṇe kiṃ na vidīryase,
SA11n1106:3622: kenāyaṃ tarhi sukhasādhanatvādinā bhāveṣu dṛṣṭādivyavahāraḥ pravartate ityatrāha dṛśyate ityādi-
SA11n1106:3627: evaṃ tarhi cittameva vedakaṃ vastusadastīti cedāha svapnamāyopamātmanā |
SA11n1106:3633: cittena sahotpannatvāt cittena saha janma yasya tasya darśanam,
SA11n1106:3635: na tu paramārthato darśanamasti yenaivaṃ dṛṣṭādivyavahāraḥ |
SA11n1106:3641: api tu jñānaṃ viṣayākāratayā tata utpadyamānamuttarakālaṃ tasya grāhakamucyate,
SA11n1106:3645: anyathā pūrvaṃ prāgbhāvi paścāduttarakālaṃ jātena utpannena jñānena smaryate nānubhūyate smṛtirūpeṇa viṣayīkriyate,
SA11n1106:3658: anyena tarhi sā jñānenānubhūyate vedanā ? āha-
SA11n1106:3660: na ca naiva | anyena tatsamānakālabhāvinā jñānenānubhūyate,
SA11n1106:3663: na cāsti vedakaḥ kaścidvedanāto na tattvataḥ |
SA11n1106:3667: ataḥ asmāt kāraṇāt vedanā anubhava iti vedanālakṣaṇaśūnyatvādvedanā na tattvataḥ na paramārthataḥ,
SA11n1106:3678: vedako vedanā vedyaḥ pṛthagbhūto na vidyate ||
SA11n1106:3680: yathā bodhistathā hyeṣā śāntā śuddhā prabhāsvarā ||iti |
SA11n1106:3682: iti na kasyacit sukhaṃ vā duḥkhaṃ vā svakīyaṃ bhavatītyāha nirātmaka ityādi-
SA11n1106:3684: nirātmake kasyacidātmādervedakasyābhāvādasvāmike kalāpe ekasyānuyāyino'bhāvāt pratītyasamutpannamātre'smin māyāsvabhāvavadupalambhagocaratāmupagate |
SA11n1106:3685: evamindrajālavat paśyan saṃjātavismayo brūte-ka evaṃ bādhyate'nayā |
SA11n1106:3692: nendriyeṣu na rūpādau nāntarāle manaḥ sthitam |
SA11n1106:3694: tatra ṣaṣṭhaṃ tāvanmanovijñānaṃ nirūpayati-tathā kva punaridaṃ manovijñānaṃ svayamupasthitam ?
SA11n1106:3695: tatra na tāvadindriyeṣu cakṣurādiṣu manaḥ sthitaṃ sthitimupagatam |
SA11n1106:3700: nāpyantarna madhye kāyasya cittaṃ nāpi bahiḥ na bāhyeṣu śarīrāvayaveṣu cittaṃ labhyate |
SA11n1106:3702: uktebhyaḥ sthānebhyaḥ anyatrāpi kkaciddeśāntare yatra tatra vā na labhyate,
SA11n1106:3705: tataḥ kathaṃ tasya niṣedha ityatrāha yanna kāye ityādi-
SA11n1106:3706: yanna kāye na cānyatra na miśraṃ na pṛthak kvacit |
SA11n1106:3715: nāpi pṛthak svātantryeṇa ca kvacidavasthitaṃ yaccittam,
SA11n1106:3716: tat paramārthato na kiṃcit na vastusat |
SA11n1106:3719: ataḥ asmāt kāraṇāt sattvāḥ prāṇinaḥ prakṛtyā svabhāvena parinirvṛtāḥ parimuktasvabhāvāḥ |
SA11n1106:3721: svayameva tu abhūtaparikalpavaśādasatyapi satyamāropya kleśavāsanopahatacittasaṃtatayaḥ saṃsāracārakāvarodhaniṣiddhasvātantryavṛttayo'parimuktā ityucyante na tu paramārthataḥ ||
SA11n1106:3722: iti mano vicārya cakṣurādivijñānaṃ vicārayannāha jñeyādityādi-
SA11n1106:3725: tathā hi na kvacit sadā sadrūpamavasthitaṃ jñānam,
SA11n1106:3726: kiṃ tu cakṣurādisāmagrīṃ pratītya utpadyamānaṃ rūpādijñeyagrāhakamityucyate,
SA11n1106:3727: iti parasyāśayamāśaṅkaya vikalpayati-tat punarjñeyāt pūrvaṃ vā syāt,
SA11n1106:3734: pūrvaṃ jñeyamālambanamantareṇa kimālambya kimāśritya asya saṃbhava utpādaḥ ?
SA11n1106:3735: dvitīyapakṣamāśrityāha-jñeyena grāhyaviṣayeṇa saha samānakālaṃ cedyadi jñānam,
SA11n1106:3740: atha jñeyādbhavet paścāt tadā jñānaṃ kuto bhavet |
SA11n1106:3744: paścāt tadanantaraṃ nivṛtte jñeye bhavet utpadyeta jñānam,
SA11n1106:3751: sa evaṃ cittaṃ parigaveṣate-katarat taccittaṃ rajyati vā duṣyati vā muhyati vā ?
SA11n1106:3757: cittaṃ hi kāśyapa nādhyātmaṃ na bahirdhā nobhayamantareṇopalabhyate |
SA11n1106:3767: cittaṃ hi kāśyapa māyāsadṛśamabhūtakalpanatayā vividhāmupapattiṃ parigṛhṇāti |
SA11n1106:3770: cittaṃ hi kāśyapa dīpārciḥsadṛśaṃ hetupratyayatayā pravartate |
SA11n1106:3775: yāvat cittaṃ hi kāśyapa parigaveṣyamāṇaṃ na labhyate |
SA11n1106:3780: yat tryadhvasamatikrāntaṃ tannaivāsti na nasti ityādi ||
SA11n1106:3781: evaṃ cittasmṛtyupasthānaṃ pratipādya dharmasmṛtyupasthānaṃ pratipādayitumuktameva kramaṃ yojayannāha evaṃ cetyādi-
SA11n1106:3784: evameva yathoditanyāyena sarvadharmāṇāṃ sarvabhāvānāmutpattirutpādo nāvasīyate na pratīyate |
SA11n1106:3785: teṣāmapi svahetutaḥ pūrvaṃ samānakālaṃ paścādvā utpattau idameva dūṣaṇaṃ yathāsaṃbhavaṃ vācyam |
SA11n1106:3788: ata eva ca anutpannāniruddhasvabhāvatayā niṣprapañcatvāt sarvadharmā vimokśābhimukhā dharmadhātuniryātā ākāśadhātuparyavasānā aprajñaptikā avyavahārā anabhilāpyā anabhilapanīyā ityucyante |
SA11n1106:3791: dharme dharmānupaśyī viharan bodhisattvo na kaṃciddharmaṃ samanupaśyati |
SA11n1106:3797: sa sarvadharmeṣu sarvakleśeṣu ca kṛtrimasaṃjñāṃ pratilabhate-niṣkleśā ete dharmā naite sakleśāḥ |
SA11n1106:3811: yaḥ pratītyasamutpādaḥ śūnyatā saiva te matā |
SA11n1106:3816: evaṃ dharmasmṛtyupasthānaṃ darśayatā sarvadharmā anutpannāniruddhāḥ prakāśitāḥ ||
SA11n1106:3818: tataḥ satyadvayavyavasthāpanaṃ na ghaṭate iti parihartuṃ codyamutthāpayannāha yadyevamityādi-
SA11n1106:3824: tataḥ saṃvṛterabhāvāt satyadvayaṃ saṃvṛtisatyaṃ paramārthasatyaṃ ceti yaduktam-
SA11n1106:3826: iti, tadetat satyadvayaṃ kutaḥ ? naiva syāt |
SA11n1106:3830: tathā marīcikādiṣu jalakalpanayeva saṃvṛtisvabhāvayā kalpanayā buddhyā vyavasthāpyate,
SA11n1106:3843: yo'pi tarhi sarvadharmaniḥsvabhāvatālakṣaṇaṃ paramārthasatyamadhigamya anupalambhayogena sarvaprapañcavirahāt parinirvṛtimupayātaḥ,
SA11n1106:3844: so'pi sattvaḥ parinirvṛto vinirmuktaḥ kuto bhavet ? naiva syāt |
SA11n1106:3847: buddhiḥ saṃvṛtirucyate iti vacanāt nirvṛtirapi saṃvṛtiḥ syāt ||
SA11n1106:3850: parasya nirvṛtasattvādanyasya sattvasya cittaṃ tasyāsau vikalpaḥ,
SA11n1106:3857: svasaṃvṛtyā nijasaṃvṛtyā svakalpanayā sa iti parinirvṛto nāsti, na vidyate |
SA11n1106:3858: parinirvṛta eva saḥ iti svayamasya sarvavikalpoparamāt |
SA11n1106:3859: anyatrāpi tarhi kathamanyasaṃvṛtiḥ syādityatrāha sa paścādityādi-
SA11n1106:3860: sa paścānniyataḥ so'sti na cennāstyeva saṃvṛtiḥ ||108 ||
SA11n1106:3863: iti dharmebhyo dharma utpadyamānaḥ paścādbhāvī bhavet |
SA11n1106:3870: etaduktaṃ bhavati-yadi nāma parinirvṛto buddhyā viṣayīkṛtaḥ,
SA11n1106:3873: na raktacittenālambitaḥ svayaṃ prahīṇasarvakleśāvaraṇo vītarāgo'pyavītarāgo bhavet |
SA11n1106:3874: tasmāt sarvakalpanāvirahādanyasaṃvṛtyālambito'pi svayaṃ parinirvṛta evāsau paramārthataḥ |
SA11n1106:3875: ata eva sarvadharmāḥ sarvakalpanāśūnyatvādanutpannāniruddhasvabhāvatvācca prakṛtiparinirvṛtā ādiśāntā ityucyante |
SA11n1106:3876: tathāpi tathāvidhebhya eva tathāvidhā anye dharmā utpadyante nirudhyante ca |
SA11n1106:3878: tena ca rūpeṇa parikalpavaśāt punarālambyamānāḥ sāṃvṛtāḥ,
SA11n1106:3880: śūnyebhya eva śūnyā dharmāḥ prabhavanti dharmebhyaḥ | iti ||
SA11n1106:3887: yatha muñca pratītya balvajaṃ rajju vyāyāmabalena vartitā |
SA11n1106:3888: ghaṭiyantra sacakra vartate teṣu ekaikaśa nāsti vartanā ||
SA11n1106:3892: mudrāt pratimudra dṛśyate mudrasaṃkrānti na copalabhyate |
SA11n1106:3893: na ca tatra na caiva sānyato eva saṃskāra anuchedaśāśvatāḥ || * * * * *
SA11n1106:3895: araṇiṃ yatha cottarāraṇiṃ hastavyāyāma trayebhi saṃgati |
SA11n1106:3896: iti pratyayato'gni jāyate jātu kṛtārthu laghu nirudhyate ||
SA11n1106:3897: atha paṇḍitu kaści mārgate kutayaṃ āgatu kutra yāti vā |
SA11n1106:3898: vidiśo diśi sarvi mārgato nāgati nāsya gatiśca labhyate ||
SA11n1106:3899: skandhāyatanāni dhātavaḥ tṛṣṇa avidyā iti karmapratyayā |
SA11n1106:3900: sāmagri tu sattvasucanā sa ca paramārthatu nopalabhyate ||iti |
SA11n1106:3908: svapnavat saṃsṛtiḥ proktā tvayā tattvavidāṃ vara || iti |
SA11n1106:3910: tasmāt paramārthata utpādanirodhābhāve'pi na saṃvṛtisatyavirodha iti sarvaṃ samañjasam ||
SA11n1106:3912: tadā na jñānaṃ na ca jñeyaṃ vastutaḥ saṃbhavati |
SA11n1106:3913: tat kimiha kena vicāryate iti vicāro'pi na syāt |
SA11n1106:3923: yathāprasiddhaṃ lokavyavahārato niścitamāśritya gṛhītvā vicāro vimarśaḥ sarva ucyate abhidhīyate |
SA11n1106:3924: sarva iti na kaścideva vicāro'pi saṃvṛtimāśritya pratanyate,
SA11n1106:3931: vicāritena tu parīkṣitena punaryadā vicāreṇa vicāryate nirūpyate,
SA11n1106:3936: vicārye tarhi vicāryamāṇe kathamiyamanavasthā na syādityatrāha vicārite ityādi-
SA11n1106:3939: vicārye tu parīkṣye punarvastuni vicārite nirṇīte sati vicārasya nirṇayasya punaruttarakālaṃ kartavyasya āśrayo nāsti,
SA11n1106:3944: sarvasamāropaniṣedhaṃ vidhāya vastutattvaparijñānāt kṛtakṛtyatvāt pravṛttinivṛttyabhāvāt na kkacit sajyate,
SA11n1106:3947: sarvavyavahāranivṛtteḥ sarvatra nirvyāpāratayā praśāntatvāt tadeva nirvāṇamabhidhīyate ||
SA11n1106:3948: kalpitaviṣaye'vaśyameva sarvatra vicāraḥ satyo na tu paramārthata ityāha yasya tvityādi-
SA11n1106:3950: yasya punaḥ paramārthasadbhāvavādinaḥ etaddūyaṃ vicāro vicāryaṃ ceti etadubhayamapi satyaṃ paramārthasat,
SA11n1106:3951: sa eva bhāvasvabhāvavādī atyantaduḥsthitaḥ atyantamatiśayena duḥkhena sthito duḥsthitaḥ duṣkaraṇīyatvāt |
SA11n1106:3953: yadi jñānavaśādartho jñānāstitve tu kā gatiḥ ||112 ||
SA11n1106:3954: yadi jñānavaśāt jñānasya pramāṇasya vaśāt sāmarthyāt arthaḥ prameyaṃ vyavasthāpyate,
SA11n1106:3958: jñānasya pramāṇasya punarastitvaṃ kuto niścitamiti vaktavyam |
SA11n1106:3959: svasaṃvedanasyābhāvāt pramāṇāntarānveṣaṇe anavasthānaṃ syāditi kā gatirāśrayaṇīyā ?
SA11n1106:3964: atha jñeyavaśājjñānaṃ jñeyāstitve tu kā gatiḥ |
SA11n1106:3966: atha jñeyasya prameyasya vaśāt jñānaṃ vyavasthāpyate,
SA11n1106:3969: tadā svayameva jñeyaṃ jñānāstitve vyavasthānibandhanaṃ syāt,
SA11n1106:3970: tacca kutaḥ pramāṇāt siddhamiti pṛcchati-jñeyāstitve punaḥ kā gatiriti |
SA11n1106:3971: prameyasiddhaye jñānāntarānusaraṇe tadapi jñānāntaraṃ kutaḥ siddhamiti vaktavyam |
SA11n1106:3975: syādetat-bhavedetat yadi jñānasya jñeyasya vā siddhaye jñānāntarāpekṣā syāt,
SA11n1106:3979: atha punarevamabhidhīyate-anyonyasya jñānasya jñeyasya parasparasya vaśāt sāmarthyāt jñānajñeyayorapi sattvamastitvaṃ niścīyate jñānavaśājjñeyasya jñeyavaśācca jñānasyeti yāvat |
SA11n1106:3985: pitā cenna vinā putrātkutaḥ putrasya saṃbhavaḥ |
SA11n1106:3987: pitā janakaḥ yadi putraṃ vinā putramantareṇa na syāt,
SA11n1106:3990: kutaḥ kasmāt piturabhāvāt putrasya janyasya saṃbhavaḥ janma astu ?
SA11n1106:3993: yataḥ putrasya abhāve asattve pitā nāsti na bhavati |
SA11n1106:3999: ataḥ itaretarāśrayaṇādekābhāvādanyatarābhāvaḥ syāditi dvayorapyanayorabhāva iti samudāyārthaḥ |
SA11n1106:4005: jñānaparicchedyatayā ca jñeyamiti yāvat jñānaṃ na sidhyati,
SA11n1106:4007: tāvat paricchedyatayā ca jñeyaṃ na sidhyati |
SA11n1106:4009: syādetat-na brūmaḥ-anyonyavaśāt siddhiranayoḥ api tu jñeyakāryaṃ jñānam,
SA11n1106:4013: jñeyājjñānena jātena tatsattā kiṃ na gamyate ||115 ||
SA11n1106:4015: bījaṃ tenaiva bījājjātena aṅkureṇa sūcyate gamyate yathā,
SA11n1106:4016: tathā atra jñeyāt prameyāt jñānena jātena utpannena tatsattā tasya jñeyasya sattā sadbhāvaḥ kiṃ na gamyate,
SA11n1106:4021: jñānāstitvaṃ kuto jñātaṃ jñeyaṃ yattena gamyate ||116 ||
SA11n1106:4024: kiṃ tarhi anyato jñānādaṅkuravyatiriktāt tadastīti gamyate |
SA11n1106:4025: tathā hi-na yogyatāmātreṇa kāryaṃ kāraṇasya gamakam,
SA11n1106:4029: ataḥ prākpratipannakāryakāraṇabhāvasya punaḥ paścāt kkacid bījāvinābhāvinamaṅkuramupalabdhavataḥ aṅkurādadhyavasāyātmakamanumānamutpadyate,
SA11n1106:4032: jñānāstitvaṃ jñānasya sadbhāvaḥ kuto jñātaṃ kasmāt pratītam ?
SA11n1106:4035: yad yasmāt jñeyaṃ tena jñānena jñeyakāryeṇa gamyate avasīyate |
SA11n1106:4036: na hi svayamaniścitaṃ liṅgaṃ sādhyasya gamakamupapadyate |
SA11n1106:4039: kālpanikapakṣe tu yathāprasiddhavyavahāramāśritya śakyate iti niścitam ||
SA11n1106:4040: na svato nāpi parato na dvābhyāṃ nāpyahetutaḥ |
SA11n1106:4041: utpannā jātu vidyante bhāvāḥ kvacana kecana ||
SA11n1106:4043: ityasyārthasya samarthanārthaṃ nāpyahetuta iti turīyakoṭiprasādhanāya tāvat svabhāvavādimatamapākartumāha loka ityādi-
SA11n1106:4045: tathā hi te svaparasvabhāvasarvahetunirapekṣameva bhāvagrāmavaicitryamutpadyate iti varṇayanti |
SA11n1106:4047: na ca cetano'pi kaścidanyaḥ karmaṇā tādṛśanirmāṇapravīṇa upalabhyate,
SA11n1106:4050: tasmāt kiṃcitkāraṇamantareṇaiva sarvamidaṃ jagadvaicitryamutpadyate iti teṣāṃ matam, taduktam-
SA11n1106:4071: padmasya rājīvasya nālamādi yeṣāṃ padmadalakesarādīnāṃ te tathoktāḥ,
SA11n1106:4074: hetubhedena hetoḥ kāraṇasya bhedena viśeṣeṇa jāyate utpadyate, nānyathā |
SA11n1106:4080: nanu bhavedeṣa viśeṣaḥ yadi hetoreva svayamasau viśeṣaḥ siddhaḥ syāt |
SA11n1106:4081: kiṃ tu tasyaiva kutaḥ sa bhavatīti vaktavyam |
SA11n1106:4086: kiṃkṛtaḥ kena kṛtaḥ kuto yātaḥ hetubhedaścet,
SA11n1106:4088: pūrvahetuprabhedataḥ pūrvasya prāktanasya tajjanakasya hetoḥ prabhedataḥ prabhedādviśeṣāt |
SA11n1106:4089: tasyāpi tatpūrvasya hetoḥ kuto viśeṣa iti cet,
SA11n1106:4091: iti uttarottarasya viśeṣākāṅkṣāyāṃ pūrvapūrvasya viśeṣādityuttaraṃ vācyam |
SA11n1106:4092: na caivamanavasthānamaniṣṭaṃ kiṃcidāpādayati-anavarāgrasya saṃsārasya pūrvakoṭirna prajñāyate ityabhyupagamāt |
SA11n1106:4093: ata eva phalāviparyayo'pi na svato bhavatītyāha kasmāccedityādi-
SA11n1106:4096: pūrvahetuprabhāvataḥ pūrvasya tajjanakasya hetoḥ sāmarthyāt svahetunā sa tādṛśastatsvabhāvo'jani yena sahakāriviśeṣopahitakāryotpādānuguṇaviśeṣaparaṃparāpariṇatimadhigacchan asati pratibandhavaikalyayoḥ saṃbhave tathāvidhameva phalamutpādayati |
SA11n1106:4103: hetuvyāpāreṇa tat prasādhayataḥ svayameva punaḥ sahetukatvābhyupagamāt vandhyā me māteti bruvataḥ iva pratijñāyāḥ svavacanena bādhanaṃ syāt ityubhayataḥpāśā rajjuriti saṃkaṭaprāpto batāyaṃ tapasvī | taduktam-
SA11n1106:4109: evaṃ svabhāvavādinaṃ nirākṛtya caturthaprakāraprasādhanārthameva īśvarakāraṇatāṃ jagataḥ pratyākhyātuṃ tadupakṣepaṃ kurvannāha īśvara ityādi-
SA11n1106:4111: īśvarakāraṇavādino hi svabhāvavādimataniṣedhamākarṇya viśeṣamabhidhātumardhamavasitaṃ bhārasyeti manyamānāḥ prāhuḥ-sāhāyyameva anuṣṭhitamevaṃ bhavadbhiḥ |
SA11n1106:4113: kevalamacetanāḥ punaramī jalapaṅkādayo vaicitryāsāmarthyā iti yuktamanenoktam |
SA11n1106:4114: tatra astyeva sa bhagavān viśvavaicitryanirmāṇapravīṇaḥ jagadekasūtradhāraḥ sakalajagadādibhūtaḥ nityātmatayā sarvadānupahataśaktiprabhāvaḥ sarvabhāvānāṃ kāryakāraṇabhāvāditattvavedī samastārvācīnadarśanāgocaramāhātmya īśvaraḥ |
SA11n1106:4115: tena hetunā sahetukaṃ sakalamidaṃ sacarācaraṃ jagaditi kaḥ sacetanaḥ anyathā vaktumutsahate ?
SA11n1106:4118: sa eva jagato viśvasya hetuḥ sṛṣṭisthitipralayakāraṇam |
SA11n1106:4120: anyathā punaracetanopādānatvāt kathamamī girisaridavanisāgarādaya utpattibhājo bhaveyuḥ ?
SA11n1106:4132: naitaducyamānamapi svasamayābhiniveśināṃ jaḍadhiyāṃ prītikaraṃ pramāṇaśūnyaṃ viduṣāṃ saṃtoṣamutpādayati |
SA11n1106:4135: tathā ca sati kāruṇikatvaṃ tasya śraddhāsamadhigamyameva syāt |
SA11n1106:4138: tat karma kāruṇikaḥ kimiti kārayati yenāniṣṭaṃ phalamupabhujyate,
SA11n1106:4141: api ca kiṃ tasminnavyāpriyamāṇe tat karmaphalamupabhujyate na vā ?
SA11n1106:4151: atha kṛtasya karmaṇo'vipraṇāśādavaśyaṃ tena tatphalamanubhavitavyamiti tadupabhogāya vyāpriyate iti cet,
SA11n1106:4155: evaṃ hi tadicchāyattavṛttitayā tasyāparipākāt tena svamaiśvaryamupadarśitaṃ tatra bhavet |
SA11n1106:4157: mahad bata anena svamaiśvaryamitthaṃ dyotitamanyatra syāt |
SA11n1106:4158: tat parakarmaṇāpi samākṛṣṭo nāma nātmani vaśitvamadhigacchati,
SA11n1106:4159: īśvarataḥ karmaṇa eva mahat sāmarthyamevaṃ prakāśitaṃ syāt |
SA11n1106:4160: tadvaraṃ karmaiva paryupāsyaṃ yatsāmarthyena samākṛṣyamāṇo maheśvaro'pi sthātumasamarthaḥ |
SA11n1106:4162: namaḥ satkarmabhyo vidhirapi na yebhyaḥ prabhavati ||iti |
SA11n1106:4167: tadā yadi nāma dayāvirahāt sukhaṃ nopanayati,
SA11n1106:4175: rāgādimatāmapi tāvajjitendriyāṇāṃ na krīḍārthaṃ dṛśyate pravṛttiḥ,
SA11n1106:4177: na rakṣaḥpiśācādimantareṇa anyasya paraduḥkhena krīḍā saṃbhāvyate ||
SA11n1106:4188: na hi svasthātmā niraparādhaṃ janaṃ pīḍayan dṛṣṭaḥ |
SA11n1106:4191: tathābhūtamapi kārayitvā punaḥ pīḍayatīti sa laukikeśvarāṇāmapi jaghanyatayā vṛttimatiśete |
SA11n1106:4195: tadā asādhu tadārādhane svargāpavargārthināṃ prekṣāvatāṃ pravṛttiḥ |
SA11n1106:4197: tathā hi svargādilipsayā tadārādhanāya pravartante prekṣāvantaḥ |
SA11n1106:4206: tadayamabhivicāryamāṇo na kvacidavasānaṃ labhate iti alaṃ durmativiṣyanditeṣu ādareṇeti |
SA11n1106:4212: tasmādakartṛkameva idaṃ jagadaśeṣamiti na paridṛṣṭakāraṇādanyaḥ svatantraścetano vā tasya kartā kaścidasti |
SA11n1106:4218: na ca anupalabdhānvayavyatirekavyāpārasya kāraṇatā prakalpayituṃ yuktā,
SA11n1106:4221: na cānyasya kṣitibījādivyatiriktasya anvayavyatirekānuvidhānaṃ kurvat dṛśyate kāryam |
SA11n1106:4222: tat kathaṃ tasya kāryopayogitvaṃ vyavasthāpyate ? yaduktam-
SA11n1106:4225: atha pṛthivyādīni bhūtānyeva īśvaro bhavatviti parābhiprāyamāśaṅkayāha bhūtāni cedityādi-
SA11n1106:4236: nāmamātre eva kimiha mahāsamārambheṇa tatprasādhanāya śramaḥ āyāsaḥ kriyate ?
SA11n1106:4238: tvayā punastānyeva bhūtāni īśvaraḥ iti nārthataḥ kaścidviśeṣaḥ ?
SA11n1106:4242: api tvaneke'nityāśca niśceṣṭā na ca devatāḥ |
SA11n1106:4257: kṣmādayaḥ kṣmā pṛthivī ādiryeṣāmaptejovāyūnāṃ te tathoktāḥ |
SA11n1106:4270: pūrvameva vistareṇa ātmanaḥ pratiṣiddhatvāt niḥsvabhāvaḥ śaśaviṣāṇavadasau |
SA11n1106:4271: athāpi syāt-avitarkyamāhātmyatvādasya nārvāgdarśanairidamitthamiti tatsvarūpaṃ vivecayituṃ śakyamityāha acintyasyetyādi-
SA11n1106:4274: tadā acintyasya ca cintāpathamatikrāntasya īśvarasya kartṛtvaṃ yugapatkāraṇatvamapi acintyamatarkyaṃ kimucyate,
SA11n1106:4283: tena īśvareṇa acintyamāhātmyena kiṃ kāryaṃ straṣṭuṃ nirmātumiṣṭamabhipretaṃ ca,
SA11n1106:4290: nanu bhoḥ, asāvātmā dhruvo nityo'bhimato bhavatām |
SA11n1106:4292: anyathā nitya eva sa na syāt |
SA11n1106:4294: anyatrāpi na tasya sṛṣṭivyāpāra upalakśyate ityāha kṣmādītyādi-
SA11n1106:4304: īśvaro'pi dhruvaḥ iti ātmānamasau na karoti |
SA11n1106:4310: karmaṇaḥ śubhāśubhāt yathāsaṃbhavaṃ sukhaduḥkhe ca bhavataḥ iṣṭāniṣṭavipākaje,
SA11n1106:4311: tatrāpi na tasya vyāpāraḥ | evaṃ sati-
SA11n1106:4318: tathāhi asau nityo vā jagato hetuḥ syādanityo vā ?
SA11n1106:4320: tatra nityatve sati hetoḥ kāraṇasya ādirnāsti,
SA11n1106:4324: nityamupasthite samarthasvabhāve hetau kāryamapi tajjanyamajastrameva jāyeta |
SA11n1106:4325: iti tatsāmarthyapratibaddhaṃ kāryaṃ sadā prāpnoti | tat-
SA11n1106:4327: kasmāt kāraṇāt sadā sarvakālaṃ na kurute ?
SA11n1106:4328: na sarvaṃ kāryaṃ janayatīti kathaṃ kasyacit kāryasya kadācit kriyāvirāmaḥ ||
SA11n1106:4329: athavā | anyathāvatāryate-yadi ca neśvaro jagataḥ kartā syāt,
SA11n1106:4332: tataśca hetoḥ kleśakarmādilakṣaṇasya ādiḥ pūrvakoṭiḥ na cedasti,
SA11n1106:4333: phalasya sattvabhājanalokavivartādilakṣaṇasya ādiḥ prathamārambhaḥ kuto bhavet ?
SA11n1106:4335: anādau saṃsāre hi sattvānāṃ karmādhipatyena sthitisaṃvartavivartānāṃ pravartanāt |
SA11n1106:4339: pralayakāle'pi tasyānupahatatayā māhātmyasyābhyupagamāt phalasya tatkṛtasya sargādilakṣaṇasya ādiḥ kuto bhavet ?
SA11n1106:4340: nityatayā tatkāraṇasya sadā samarthatvāt sargādikamapi nityameva syāt |
SA11n1106:4341: ato nityasamarthe tasmin sargāderādireva na syāt |
SA11n1106:4342: tataḥ kathaṃ sargasyādāvapi tadvayāpāro bhavet ? api ca |
SA11n1106:4354: athāpi syāt-yadi nāma asau sadā samarthasvabhāvaḥ,
SA11n1106:4361: na hi nityatayā anādheyātiśayasya kācidapekṣā nāma |
SA11n1106:4369: tathāpi te nityā vā syuranityā vā ?
SA11n1106:4382: tena kāraṇena tadāyattavṛttīnāṃ sahakāriṇāṃ sadāsaṃnihitatvādasau nityaḥ kartā kimapekṣatām ?
SA11n1106:4384: itthaṃ na kācidapi tasyāpekśāstīti sadā kāryaṃ kurvīta ||
SA11n1106:4388: tadasya nimittakāraṇatvāt sāmagrīmapekṣya kāryaṃ kurvato noktadoṣaprasaṅgaḥ iti parāśayamāśaṅkayāha apekṣata ityādi-
SA11n1106:4390: yadi nāma asau sadā sarvakāryāṇi kartuṃ samarthaḥ,
SA11n1106:4392: na hi sāmagrīmantareṇa satyapi samarthe kartari kāryamutpadyate |
SA11n1106:4393: yathā kila paṭotpādanasamarthe'pi kvaciddhetau turītantuvemādikamantareṇa na paṭa utpadyate,
SA11n1106:4404: svarūpaṃ cāsya prāgapi samarthaṃ tadeveti kathaṃ kadācit kriyāvirāmaḥ ?
SA11n1106:4409: anyathāpi teṣāmapi pūrvaṃ tatsāmarthyasadbhāve tatkriyāprasaṅgo na nivartate iti sādhyavikalo dṛṣṭāntaḥ |
SA11n1106:4412: sa ca sarvadā saṃnihitasvabhāva iti kathaṃ kadācit sāmagrīvaikalyamapyasya ?
SA11n1106:4424: na ca avidyamānasvabhāve vandhyāsuta iva kiṃcit kartuṃ śakyate nīrūpatvāt |
SA11n1106:4449: evaṃ kurvataḥ kāryamabhinirvartayataḥ sataḥ tasya kuta īśatā,
SA11n1106:4456: tathā hi tā api icchāḥ svasattāmātranibandhanāḥ kiṃ na karotīti sa eva tasyopālambhaḥ |
SA11n1106:4459: kiṃ tāsāṃ viyoge'pi na karoti atha asahakārivaikalye'pi kāryākaraṇe sarvadā tadāyattaḥ ?
SA11n1106:4461: tathā tadbhāve'pi sarvakāryaṃ kiṃ na karoti ?
SA11n1106:4466: na hi svarūpeṇa akārakaḥ kārako nāma |
SA11n1106:4469: samartho'pyeṣa prakṛtyā sahakāriṇāmasaṃnidhau nava kāraka iti cet,
SA11n1106:4470: mātāpi satī prakṛtyā bandhyā ityetadapi tarhi devānāṃ priyeṇa vaktavyamityāstāṃ tāvat |
SA11n1106:4472: tathā ca sati anyasādhāraṇasvabhāvasya kathamīśatvamiti neśvarakāryaṃ jagadvaicitryamiti siddham ||
SA11n1106:4474: tarhi nityaparamāṇupuñjamayaṃ dvayaṇukādikrameṇotthaṃ kṣititaruparvatādikaṃ bhavatvityāha ye'pītyādi-
SA11n1106:4476: ye'pi mīmāṃsakādivādino nityānaṇūn paramāṇunāhuḥ jagadvaicitryakāraṇatvena bruvate,
SA11n1106:4477: te'pi vādinaḥ pūrvam “aṃśā apyaṇubhedena“ [9.87]ityādinā paramāṇuvicārasamaye tatpratiṣedhānnivāritā nirākṛtāḥ ato nityaparamāṇumayamapi nedaṃ jagat ||
SA11n1106:4478: evamīśvarakāraṇatāṃ ślokārdhena antarāle eva nityaparamāṇusvabhāvatāṃ ca jagato nirasya tasyaiva turyaprakārasya samarthanāya pradhānapariṇāmarūpatāṃ nirākartuṃ sāṃkhyamatamudbhāvayannāha sāṃkhyā ityādi-
SA11n1106:4480: sāṃkhyāḥ kāpilāḥ pradhānaṃ prakṛtirityaparanāmadheyam icchanti manyante nityaṃ lokasya kāraṇam |
SA11n1106:4481: tacca nityamavinaśvarasvabhāvaṃ lokasya sarvasya carācarasya jagataḥ kāraṇaṃ pariṇāmarūpeṇa hetumicchanti ||
SA11n1106:4485: sattvaṃ rajastamaśceti ete trayo guṇā aviṣamaṃ sthitāḥ sāmyāvasthāṃ prāptāḥ pradhānamiti kathyante,
SA11n1106:4504: ṣoḍaśaka iti ekādaśendriyāṇi pañca ca tanmātrāṇi |
SA11n1106:4506: pañca buddhīndriyāṇi śrotraṃ tvakū cakṣū rasanaṃ ghrāṇaṃ ceti |
SA11n1106:4510: pañcabhyaḥ śabdādibhyaḥ pañca bhūtāni bhavanti pañca bhūtāni ca ākāśavāyutejojalapṛthivyākhyāni |
SA11n1106:4512: mahadahaṃkārau śabdādayaśca pañca kāryaṃ kāraṇaṃ ca |
SA11n1106:4513: ekādaśendriyāṇi ākāśādayaśca pañca kāryameva na kāraṇam |
SA11n1106:4516: ṣoḍaśakastu vikāro na prakṛtirna vikṛtiḥ puruṣaḥ ||iti |
SA11n1106:4526: evaṃ kila pradhānāt kāryarūpeṇa jagadvivartaḥ pravartate iti kāpilāḥ |
SA11n1106:4527: tadevaṃ tat sarvamākāśe viracitacitramiva pratibhāsate iti manyamānaḥ siddhāntavādī dūṣayitumāha ekasyeti-
SA11n1106:4529: ekasya sataḥ pradhānasya trisvabhāvatvaṃ sattvarajastamobhedena tryātmakatvamayuktamasaṃgatam |
SA11n1106:4536: evaṃ guṇā na vidyante pratyekaṃ te'pi hi tridhā ||129 ||
SA11n1106:4537: evameva pradhānavat guṇāḥ sattvarajastamorūpā na vidyante |
SA11n1106:4541: tathā hi sarvaṃ triguṇātmakaṃ bruvatāṃ pratyekaṃ guṇā api svarūpeṇa triguṇātmakāḥ prāpnuvanti |
SA11n1106:4542: tathā tadguṇā api triguṇātmakatayā naikasvabhāvā vidyante ||
SA11n1106:4543: yadā caivaṃ vicārayato guṇā na santi,
SA11n1106:4544: tadā tadvivartarūpāḥ śabdādayo'pi na yujyante ityāha guṇābhāve ityādi-
SA11n1106:4557: yaśca sattvādīnāṃ sukhādirūpatāmupapādayituṃ tatpariṇāmasya rūpādino vyaktasya sukhādyanvayo heturuktaḥ,
SA11n1106:4562: vastrādau acitsvabhāve paṭādau sukhāderapi cidātmakasya tādātmyenāsaṃbhavaḥ abhāvaḥ |
SA11n1106:4564: te ca guṇā na hi santi |
SA11n1106:4566: athāpi syāt-na sukhādyātmakatayā parādayaḥ sukhādisvabhāvā ucyante,
SA11n1106:4569: tasya sukhāderheturūpāḥ kāraṇasvabhāvā bhāvā bāhyāḥ paṭādayaścenmatam,
SA11n1106:4575: tat ke ime bhāvāḥ sukhādiheturūpā bhaviṣyanti ? api ca |
SA11n1106:4576: vyaktasya sukhādisvabhāvatve paṭādaya eva sukhādijanyāḥ syurityāha sukhādyevetyādi-
SA11n1106:4592: paṭādikāryatvāt sukhādyapi na syāditi tadanvayavyatirekānuvidhānāt sukhādestatkāryatvam |
SA11n1106:4602: satyāmeva sukhavyaktau saṃvittiḥ kiṃ na gṛhyate |
SA11n1106:4607: ekadā bhūtāyāṃ sukhavyaktau sukhasya nityatve sati |
SA11n1106:4609: sukhasya saṃvedanaṃ sarvadā kiṃ na syāt ?
SA11n1106:4611: tasmāt kadācidanupalabhyamānaṃ tat tadā nāstīti niścitamiti kathaṃ nityatvam ?
SA11n1106:4615: tadeva sūkṣmatāṃ yāti sthūlaṃ sūkṣmaṃ ca tatkatham ||133 ||
SA11n1106:4620: kutaḥ ? yad yasmāt sthūlaṃ vyaktasvabhāvaṃ sat,
SA11n1106:4623: nitya tayā nānāsvabhāvatā ekasya na yukteti bhāvaḥ ||
SA11n1106:4624: athāpi syāt-ekadā parasparaviruddhayorekasminnayogaḥ pūrvadharmanivṛttau tu dharmāntarotpatterna doṣa ityāha sthaulyamityādi-
SA11n1106:4626: sthaulyamāvirbhāvarūpatāṃ tyaktvā parityajya bhavet sūkṣmaṃ tirohitarūpaṃ syāt |
SA11n1106:4627: evamabhyupagame sati anitye sthaulyasūkṣmate utpādavināśālīḍhatvādadhruve sthaulyasūkṣmate syātām |
SA11n1106:4635: anyathā kathaṃcit kenacidrūpeṇa avasthānāt pūrvavat punarupalabdheḥ prasaṅgaḥ |
SA11n1106:4642: tathā hi tat sthaulyaṃ sukhādbhinnamabhinnaṃ vā syāt |
SA11n1106:4644: tadā tasmin nivṛtte'pi pūrvavat sukhasaṃvedanaṃ syāt |
SA11n1106:4647: na ca satyapi saṃbandhe akāraṇasya nivṛttau anyasya nivṛttiryujyate,
SA11n1106:4655: yadi sthaulyaṃ sukhādanyat bhinnaṃ na bhavati,
SA11n1106:4658: tatsvabhāvatayā sthaulyasya nivṛttau sukhasya vinivṛtteḥ sukhasya anityatā vinaśvaratā sphuṭaṃ niścitam ||
SA11n1106:4676: anabhilāṣiṇo'pi te tava sadutpattivādinaḥ sthitā āpannā |
SA11n1106:4677: anyathā prāgapi tasya sadbhāve paścādvat pūrvamapi tadupalabdhiprasaṅgaḥ |
SA11n1106:4681: api ca | satkāryavādinaḥ kāraṇāvasthāyāṃ kāryasadbhāvāt idamapi dūṣaṇamaparamāśaṅkayate ityāha annāda ityādi-
SA11n1106:4683: annamattītyannādaḥ annabhakṣakaḥ amedhyabhakṣaḥ syāt aśucibhoktā bhavet | katham ?
SA11n1106:4689: kiṃ ca idamapi satkāryavādinaḥ prasaṅgāntaramāsañjayannāha paṭārgheṇetyādi-
SA11n1106:4692: karpāsabīje kāraṇe bhaviṣyataḥ paṭasya kāryasya sadbhāvāt paṭasyārgheṇa mūlyena karpāsabījaṃ krītvā gṛhītvā nivasyatāṃ paridhīyatām ||
SA11n1106:4693: athāpi syāt-yadi nāma paramārthataḥ kāraṇe kāryamasti,
SA11n1106:4694: tathāpi nāyaṃ saṃvṛtyavidyātimiropahatalocanaḥ sāṃvyavahāriko lokaḥ paśyatītyāśaṅkayannāha mohādityādi-
SA11n1106:4696: mohādajñānāt sadapi vastutattvaṃ nekṣate na paśyati lokaḥ |
SA11n1106:4700: yadi nāma na loko'paśyaṃstathā vyavahāraṃ karoti,
SA11n1106:4703: yataḥ tattvajñasyāpi kāraṇe kāryamastīti paramārthavedino'pi sāṃkhyasya sā sthitiḥ,
SA11n1106:4705: te'pi dṛśyante annabhakṣaṇādiṣu pravartamānāḥ karpāsabījaṃ paṭārthinaḥ pariharantaḥ ||
SA11n1106:4711: tathāhi-kāryaṃ dṛṣṭvā kāraṇe astīti niścayaḥ ubhayorapi tattvajñasya lokasya ca sādhāraṇaḥ |
SA11n1106:4724: evaṃ ca pariniṣṭhitaḥ kāpilaḥ siddhāntavādino'pi sādhāraṇadūṣaṇamāsañjayannāha pramāṇamityādi-
SA11n1106:4726: yadi pramāṇamapi paramārthataḥ pramāṇaṃ na bhavatīti bhavatāṃ pakṣaḥ,
SA11n1106:4728: pramāṇasyāprāmāṇye tatpramitaṃ tena pramāṇena paricchinnaṃ mṛṣā alīkaṃ prāpnoti |
SA11n1106:4732: tadā yeyaṃ bhāvānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ tattvataḥ paramārthataḥ śūnyatā sarvadharmaniḥsvabhāvatā tasmāt pramāṇānniścitā,
SA11n1106:4735: sarvapramāṇopadarśitasya mṛṣārthatvāt sāpi sarvadharmaniḥsvabhāvatā tadvicārakapramāṇopadarśitaiva iti samāno nyāyaḥ ||
SA11n1106:4738: kalpanākalpitaṃ samāropitaṃ bhāvamaspṛṣṭvā kalpanābuddhayā agṛhītvā tadabhāvo na gṛhyate nālambyate |
SA11n1106:4739: tathāhi ghaṭamāropitarūpeṇa parikalpya tatsaṃbandhitayā ghaṭābhāvaṃ pratipadyate lokaḥ |
SA11n1106:4740: ghaṭasya vicāreṇa lokaprasiddhenaiva yadā na kiṃcit svarūpamavatiṣṭhate,
SA11n1106:4741: tadā tadabhāvaḥ tadviparyayarūpaḥ sutarāṃ na kaścit |
SA11n1106:4743: tasmādbhāvo mṛṣā yo hi tasyābhāvaḥ sphuṭaṃ mṛṣā ||140 ||
SA11n1106:4747: tasya niḥsvabhāvasya bhāvasya abhāvo virahaḥ sphuṭaṃ niścitaṃ mṛṣā asatyaḥ |
SA11n1106:4749: evaṃ ca bhāvābhāvayoḥ parikalpitarūpatve sarvadharmaniḥsvabhāvataiva avatiṣṭhate ||
SA11n1106:4750: punaridameva upasaṃhāravyājena vispaṣṭayannāha tasmāt svapne ityādi-
SA11n1106:4751: tasmātsvapne sute naṣṭe sa nāstīti vikalpanā |
SA11n1106:4753: tasmāt svapne middhākrāntacittāvasthāyāmutpannavinaṣṭe sute putre sati sa putro nāstīti vikalpanā tadabhāvavikalpaḥ | kiṃ karoti?
SA11n1106:4755: tasya sutasya bhāvaḥ tasyāstitvaṃ tasya kalpanā sattvasamāropaḥ tasyotpādaḥ unmajjanaṃ taṃ ni[vi?]badhnāti |
SA11n1106:4758: sā kalpanā tadbhāvakalpanāṃ vibadhnāti api mṛṣā |
SA11n1106:4760: athavā satyābhimate eva sute svapne naṣṭe sarvametadyojanīyam |
SA11n1106:4762: etaduktaṃ bhavati-yathā svapnopalabdhasya vastuno'nutpannāniruddhasyāpi kalpanopadarśitau bhāvābhāvau na paramārthasantau,
SA11n1106:4764: na ca sā kalpanā asatyārthaviṣayatayā apramāṇam,
SA11n1106:4767: iti tasyā aprāmāṇye'pi na sarvadharmaniḥsvabhāvatā vighaṭate |
SA11n1106:4774: evamahetubhūtasvabhāveśvarapradhānakartṛtvaṃ jagato nirākṛtya nāpyahetutaḥ ityasyārthaṃ prasādhya upasaṃharannāha tasmādevamityādi-
SA11n1106:4778: svabhāvāderahetuto'kāraṇājjātaṃ kiṃcit kāryaṃ nāsti na vidyate |
SA11n1106:4783: nanu yadi nāma svabhāveśvarapradhānāderahetuto na kiṃcidasti,
SA11n1106:4785: tat kathaṃ sarvadharmāṇāṃ niḥsvabhāvatā setsyatīti parāśayamāśaṅkaya na svato nāpi parato na dvābhyām iti koṭitrayaṃ samarthayannāha na ca vyastetyādi-
SA11n1106:4787: na ca naiva | vyastasamasteṣviti vyasteṣu samastesu ca |
SA11n1106:4793: tatra na tāvat svataḥ svabhāvādbhāvā utpadyante |
SA11n1106:4794: utpādāt pūrvaṃ tasya svabhāvasyāvidyamānatvāt kuta utpadyantām?
SA11n1106:4795: utpanne ca tasmin satyapi svarūpe tasyāpi niṣpannatvāt kimutpadyantām ? api ca |
SA11n1106:4796: svata eva janmani jātasyaiva punarjanma syāt |
SA11n1106:4799: jātasya punarjanmani bījadīnāmeva āsaṃsāraṃ pravṛtteḥ nāṅkurādayaḥ kadācidutpattumavasaraṃ labheran |
SA11n1106:4800: na ca etadabhyupagacchato'pi lokata eva bādhāmanubhavat siddhipathamupayāti,
SA11n1106:4806: tathā hi yāvat svabhāvo na bhavati,
SA11n1106:4812: parato hi janmani iṣyamāṇe śālibījādapi kodravāṅkurasyotpattiprasaṅgaḥ |
SA11n1106:4817: tathāpi kāryakāraṇayoranyonyajanyajanakabhāvasya niyāmakatvāt na sarvasyotpattiriti cet, na |
SA11n1106:4818: anutpanne hi kārye kasmin punarasya śaktiriti vaktavyam |
SA11n1106:4825: iti na kiṃcit kenacidekasaṃtatipatitaṃ sadṛśaṃ vā janyajanakabhāvaniyataṃ vā asti,
SA11n1106:4832: na hi ekenāndhenādṛṣṭamārgo bahubhirapi draṣṭuṃ śakyate |
SA11n1106:4833: pratyekaṃ vā sikatāstailadānāsamarthā militā api tatsamarthā bhavanti |
SA11n1106:4835: iti svaparobhayajanitamahetujanitaṃ vā tattvato na kiṃcidasti |
SA11n1106:4836: tasmāt paramārthato'nutpannāniruddhasvabhāvaṃ māyāmarīcipratibimbapratiśrutkāsamaṃ pratītyasamutpannaṃ svabhāvaśūnyameva sarvaṃ viśvamābhāsate |
SA11n1106:4840: ihoktaṃ bhagavatā-ya imaṃ pratītyasamutpādaṃ satatasamitaṃ nirjīvaṃ yathāvadaviparītamajīvamajātamabhūtamakṛtamasaṃskṛtamapratighamanālambanaṃ śivamabhayamanāhāryamavyayamavyupaśamasvabhāvaṃ paśyati,
SA11n1106:4842: yastu evaṃ satatasamitaṃ nirjīvam-ityādi pūrvavat yāvat-avyupaśamasvabhāvaṃ paśyati so'nuttaradharmaśarīraṃ buddhaṃ paśyati |
SA11n1106:4847: atha ca punarayaṃ pratītyasamutpādo dvābhyāṃ kāraṇābhyāmutpadyate |
SA11n1106:4867: evaṃ yāvat puṣpasya naivaṃ bhavati-ahaṃ phalamabhinirvartayāmīti,
SA11n1106:4870: evaṃ yāvat puṣpe sati phalasyābhinirvṛttirbhavati prādurbhāvaḥ |
SA11n1106:4875: yadidaṃ pṛthivyaptejovāyvākāśaṛtusamavāyāt bāhyasya pratītyasamutpādasya pratyayopanibandho draṣṭavyaḥ |
SA11n1106:4885: tadā sarveṣāṃ samavāyāt bīje nirudhyamāne aṅkurasyābhinirvṛttirbhavati |
SA11n1106:4886: tatra pṛthivīdhātornaivaṃ bhavati-ahaṃ bījasya saṃdhāraṇākṛtyaṃ karomīti |
SA11n1106:4887: evaṃ yāvadṛtorapi naivaṃ bhavati-ahaṃ bījasya pariṇāmanākṛtyaṃ karomīti |
SA11n1106:4889: atha punaḥ satsu eteṣu bīje nirudhyamāne aṅkurasyābhinirvṛttirbhavati |
SA11n1106:4890: sa cāyamaṅkuro na svayaṃkṛto na parakṛto nobhayakṛto neśvaranirmito na kālapariṇāmito na prakṛtisaṃbhūto na caikakāraṇādhīno nāpyahetusamutpannaḥ |
SA11n1106:4895: na śāśvatato nocchedato na saṃkrāntitaḥ parīttahetuto vipulaphalābhinirvṛttitaḥ tatsadṛśānuprabandhataśceti |
SA11n1106:4898: na ca yadeva bījaṃ sa evāṅkuraḥ |
SA11n1106:4928: pratītyasamutpādo'pi yathāvadevaṃ saṃgacchate iti traikālyavādimatamāśaṅkayāha anyata ityādi-
SA11n1106:4929: anyato nāpi cāyātaṃ na tiṣṭhati na gacchati |
SA11n1106:4939: sa ca dharmo na ca nityaḥ iti kathametat setsyati?
SA11n1106:4940: atha pūrvāparakālayoḥ kāritraśūnyatayā dharmasya adhvasu viśeṣaḥ |
SA11n1106:4941: tathā hi yadā asaṃprāptakāritraḥ kṛtyaṃ na karoti,
SA11n1106:4944: yadā tu kṛtyānnivṛttaḥ tadā atīta iti viśeṣaḥ |
SA11n1106:4946: tenaivātmanā tasyaiva tadāpi sadbhāvāt kāritramapi kathaṃ na syāditi vaktavyam |
SA11n1106:4949: kāritraṃ vā kathamatītamanāgataṃ pratyutpannaṃ ca ucyate ?
SA11n1106:4952: pāścātye ca dharmasyāpi svayamatītatvādivyavasthāyāṃ na kiṃcit kṣīyate |
SA11n1106:4964: svabhāvaḥ sarvadā nāsti bhāvo nityaśca neṣyate |
SA11n1106:4986: pratibhāsamānasya ca pratyutpannasya na rūpaṃ kiṃcidvicāreṇāvatiṣṭhate, tadā-
SA11n1106:4987: māyātaḥ ko viśeṣo'sya yanmūḍhaiḥ satyataḥ kṛtam ||143 ||
SA11n1106:4988: māyātaḥ aindrajālikanirmitahastyādirūpāyā api niḥsvabhāvatayā viśeṣo naiva kaścit asya hetupratyayopajanitasya vasturūpasya paridṛśyamānasya ||
SA11n1106:4992: āyāti tatkutaḥ kutra yāti ceti nirūpyatām ||144 ||
SA11n1106:4996: yacca vasturūpaṃ māyāhetunā māyāsvabhāvena yadviracitamiti yāvat |
SA11n1106:5000: tanmāyānimirtaṃ hetunirmitaṃ vā vasturūpaṃ kutaḥ kasmāt ?
SA11n1106:5004: yadi tasya kutaścidāgacchati kvacid gacchati vā upalabhyate ||
SA11n1106:5017: evaṃbhūte vasturūpe kṛtrime parāyattavṛttitayā asvābhāvike satyatā amṛṣārthatā kutaḥ ?
SA11n1106:5020: hetutaḥ saṃbhavo yeṣāṃ tadabhāvānna santi ye |
SA11n1106:5021: kathaṃ nāma na te spaṣṭaṃ pratibimbasamā matāḥ ||iti |
SA11n1106:5024: na ca hetupratyayānāṃ sāmarthyaṃ kvacidapi paramārthataḥ saṃbhavati ||
SA11n1106:5028: tatra na vidyamānaḥ kriyate ityāha vidyamānasyetyādi-
SA11n1106:5030: vidyamānasya kāraṇavyāpārāt prāgeva satsvabhāvasya hetunā kāraṇena kiṃ prayojanam ?
SA11n1106:5039: syādetat-yadi nāma vidyamānasya niṣpannatvāt kartavyābhāvāt na hetunā kimapi prayojanam,
SA11n1106:5040: avidyamānasya tu kiṃ na bhavatītyāha nābhāvasyetyādi-
SA11n1106:5057: ko vā tarhi abhāvādanyaḥ aparaḥ bhāvatām,
SA11n1106:5062: kiṃ tarhi prāgabhāvasya bhāvavirodhinaḥ sadbhāvāttadā bhāvo na bhavati,
SA11n1106:5071: tenaivotpadyamānena bhāvena abhāvasya vināśo bhaviṣyatīti cedāha-
SA11n1106:5076: tasmāt na ajātena anutpannena bhāvena so'bhāvaḥ prāgabhāvarūpaḥ apagamiṣyati nivartayiṣyate ||
SA11n1106:5079: utpanne ca bhāve bhāvābhāvayoḥ parasparaparihārāt paścādabhāvaḥ svayameva apagamiṣyatītyāha na cetyādi-
SA11n1106:5085: na caiva anapagate anivṛtte abhāve bhāvasyāvasaraḥ avakāśaḥ,
SA11n1106:5096: tasmādbhāvātmani abhāvātmani vā kārye na kāraṇasya vyāpāro yujyate |
SA11n1106:5097: ubhayānubhayapakṣe ca pratyekapakṣaniṣedhādeva kāraṇavyāpārasya niṣedhaḥ kṛto bhavatīti draṣṭavyam |
SA11n1106:5100: na sannutpadyate bhāvo nāpyasan sadasanna ca |
SA11n1106:5101: na svato nāpi parato na dvābhyāṃ jāyate katham ||iti |
SA11n1106:5103: evaṃ tāvadbhāvasyotpattiḥ paramārthato na kathaṃcidapi saṃgacchate |
SA11n1106:5104: nāpi kathaṃcidutpannasya satsvabhāvasya nivṛttiryujyate ityāha bhāvaścetyādi-
SA11n1106:5111: tadā ca ekasyaiva vastunaḥ dvayoḥ svabhāvayoḥ prasaṅgaḥ syāt,
SA11n1106:5113: na ca bhāvatāṃ parityajya abhāvarūpatāṃ yātīti vaktumucitam |
SA11n1106:5114: tadā ca bhāvasyaivābhāvāt ko'bhāvarūpatāṃ yātīti na vidmaḥ |
SA11n1106:5117: itthaṃ bhāvasyotpādavināśayoḥ paramārthato'bhāvaṃ prasādhya upasaṃharannāha evamityādi-
SA11n1106:5118: evaṃ na ca nirodho'sti na ca bhāvo'sti sarvadā |
SA11n1106:5127: “utpādādvā tathāgatānāmanutpādādvā tathāgatānāṃ sthitaivaiṣā dharmāṇāṃ dharmatā dharmasamatā dharmasthititā dharmaniyāmatā dharmadhātuḥ tathatā avitathatā“ |
SA11n1106:5134: idaṃ niḥsvabhāvatāsamānādhikaraṇaṃ jagadviścaṃ sattvabhājanalokasaṃjñitaṃ sacarācaraṃ vā |
SA11n1106:5139: sā ca śūnyatā notpadyate na nirudhyate āha-yadi evaṃ sarvadharmāḥ śūnyā uktā bhagavatā,
SA11n1106:5147: āha-yadetaduktaṃ bhagavatā saṃskṛtā dharmā utpadyante nirudhyante ca ityasya tathāgatabhāṣitasya ko'bhiprāyaḥ ?
SA11n1106:5149: tatra tathāgato mahākārūṇiko lokasya trāsapadaparihārārthaṃ vyavahāravaśāduktavān utpadyante nirudhyante ca |
SA11n1106:5150: na cātra kasyaciddharmasya utpādo na nirodhaḥ ||iti ||
SA11n1106:5152: iti jagato niḥsvabhāvatāyāṃ tadantargatānāṃ narakādigatīnāmapi niḥsvabhāvataivetyupadarśayannāha svapnetyādi-
SA11n1106:5154: svapnena upamā tulyaṃ yāsāṃ tāḥ tathoktāḥ |
SA11n1106:5162: sarvadharmāṇāṃ niḥsvabhāvatayā vicāre vimarśe sati yasmāt kadalīsamāḥ kadalīvanniḥsārāḥ gatayaḥ,
SA11n1106:5174: kutaḥ ? vastutaḥ paramārthataḥ sarvadharmāṇāṃ niḥsvabhāvatayā prakṛtiparinirvṛtatvāt |
SA11n1106:5178: ātmanaśca pareṣāṃ ca samatā tena te matā ||iti ||
SA11n1106:5180: iti paramārthatattvāparijñānānmithyābhiniveśādāropitajagajjālamupakalpya ātmanaiva ātmānamākulayati bālajanaḥ ityupadarśayannāha evamityādi-
SA11n1106:5181: evaṃ śūnyeṣu dharmeṣu kiṃ labdhaṃ kiṃ hṛtaṃ bhavet |
SA11n1106:5182: satkṛtaḥ paribhūto vā kena kaḥ saṃbhaviṣyati ||152 ||
SA11n1106:5183: kutaḥ sukhaṃ vā duḥkhaṃ vā kiṃ priyaṃ vā kimapriyam |
SA11n1106:5184: kā tṛṣṇā kutra sā tṛṣṇā mṛgyamāṇā svabhāvataḥ ||153 ||
SA11n1106:5185: vicāre jīvalokaḥ kaḥ ko nāmātra mariṣyati |
SA11n1106:5186: ko bhaviṣyati ko bhūtaḥ ko bandhuḥ kasya kaḥ suhṛt ||154 ||
SA11n1106:5187: evaṃ pratipāditanyāyena śūnyeṣu niḥsvabhāveṣu dharmeṣu kiṃ labdham,
SA11n1106:5189: kiṃ hṛtam, kimapahṛtaṃ kena kasyacit bhavet,
SA11n1106:5192: paribhūtaḥ apakṛto vā kena kaḥ saṃbhaviṣyati ?
SA11n1106:5198: kiṃ priyaṃ vā kiṃ vallabhaṃ vā ?
SA11n1106:5203: kā tṛṣṇā yayā lābhādyarthaṃ tṛṣyati janaḥ ?
SA11n1106:5210: vicāre paramārthasvarūpanirūpaṇe sati jīvalokaḥ sattvalokaḥ kaḥ ?
SA11n1106:5213: jīvalokasya vicāreṇa asatsvabhāvatvāt ko nāmātra jīvaloke mariṣyati,
SA11n1106:5229: parigṛhṇantu avidyamānameva tu svarūpamāropya madvidhā iti granthakāraḥ ātmānameva nidarśanaṃ karoti |
SA11n1106:5238: tacca bhagavatā śūnyataḥ sudṛṣṭaṃ suviditaṃ susākṣātkṛtam |
SA11n1106:5244: yāvat na lābho nālābho na duḥkhaṃ na sukhaṃ na yaśo nāyaśaḥ na rūpaṃ nārūpamityādi |
SA11n1106:5281: vyathā yeṣvapāyeṣu te tathoktāḥ, teṣu ca |
SA11n1106:5291: bhave saṃsāre kāmarūpārūpyasvabhāve bahuprapātaśca bahutara upaghātaśca |
SA11n1106:5293: tatra ca bhave prapāte vā atattvamīdṛśaṃ vyāmohavijṛmbhitametādṛśaṃ sarvajanasādhāraṇaṃ yathāvidhaṃ pratipāditaṃ paridṛśyamānaṃ vā |
SA11n1106:5295: tatra evaṃvidhe atattve sati anyonyavirodhaḥ parasparavipratipattiḥ |
SA11n1106:5302: anantā anavadhikālavipākatayā aparyantā vā duḥkhānāmativipulatayā mahāyānamanadhigamya nistarītumaśakyatvāt, sāgarāḥ |
SA11n1106:5303: tathāpi kathaṃcit mahatā vīryeṇa kuśalapakṣopacayāt bhūyasā kālena sugatiṃ prāpya kṣapayituṃ śakyante ityata āha tatraivamityādi-
SA11n1106:5308: tatra tathārūpe samāveśe evaṃ paridṛśyamānarūpā alpabalatā |
SA11n1106:5315: ārogyasya ārogyāya vārogopaśamāya vyāpāraiḥ viśeṣeṇa kaṭutiktabhaiṣajyakaṣāyapānādibhiḥ |
SA11n1106:5316: kuśalopārjanamantareṇa vṛthā caiva āyurvahatyāśu iti vakṣyamāṇena saṃbandhaḥ |
SA11n1106:5330: vṛthaiva niṣphalameva kuśalapakṣopacayarahitatvāt āyurvahati yāti āśu śīghram,
SA11n1106:5342: tatrāpi evamavasthāṃ gate'pi abhyastavikṣepaḥ pariśīlitamauddhatyaṃ tasya nivāraṇaṃ nivartanaṃ tasya gatiranupraveśaḥ kutaḥ ? naivāsti |
SA11n1106:5343: tatrāpi evamanarthaparaṃparāyāṃ sthitānāṃ kathaṃcit kuśalapakṣaṃ samīkṣya māro yatate mahāpāyaprapātane,
SA11n1106:5344: kleśamāro devaputramāro vā yatate udyacchate mahāpāyaprapātane prapātananimittam |
SA11n1106:5346: evamapi kadācit satyaratnādiṣu abhisaṃpratyayavaśāt kathaṃcit kalyāṇamupajāyate ityāha tatrāsanmārgetyādi-
SA11n1106:5350: tatra evaṃ daśāṃ prāpnoti-samyagdṛṣṭivipakṣasya asanmārgasya cārvākamīmāṃsakādiparidīpitasya bāhulyāt bhūyastvāt vicikitsā sanmārge vimatiśca durjayā,
SA11n1106:5358: kathaṃcit buddhotpādasaṃbhave'pi kleśaughaḥ [jātijarāmaraṇā] dīnāmoghaḥ avicchinnaḥ pravāhaḥ |
SA11n1106:5366: sāṃpratamevaṃ sattvān suduḥkhitān samīkṣya karuṇāmreḍitahṛdayaḥ paraduḥkhaduḥkhī śāstrakāraḥ sattvānāṃ duḥkhaṃ śocayannāha aho bateti-
SA11n1106:5371: ke punaramī sattvāḥ śocanīyā ityāha ye ityādi-
SA11n1106:5373: ye sattvā avidyāndhīkṛtajñānalocanāḥ nekṣante na paśyanti svadauḥsthityaṃ svasya ātmano duḥkhāvasthitatvam |
SA11n1106:5379: snātvā snātvā jalāvagāhanaṃ kṛtvā kṛtvā yathā kaścidupahatabuddhiḥ śītārtaḥ sukhābhilāṣī |
SA11n1106:5386: aho bata atibahulatarājñānāndhakārākramaṇamamīṣāṃ yadātmagatamapi pramādaṃ na paśyantītyāha ajaretyādi-
SA11n1106:5389: na vidyate jarā jīrṇatā yeṣāṃ te ajarāḥ |
SA11n1106:5391: teṣāmajarāṇāmamarāṇāmiva līlā viceṣṭitaṃ yeṣāṃ te tathoktāḥ |
SA11n1106:5392: teṣāmevamanayā līlayā viharatāṃ niścitaṃ vicaratāṃ satām |
SA11n1106:5400: tadyathā mahārāja catasṛbhyo digbhyaścatvāraḥ parvatā āgaccheyuḥ,
SA11n1106:5408: tebhyo na sukaraṃ javena vā palāyitum,
SA11n1106:5411: yeṣāṃ na sukaraṃ javena vā palāyitum,
SA11n1106:5420: tadyathā mahārāja siṃho mṛgarājo rūpasaṃpanno javasaṃpannaḥ sujātanakhadaṃṣṭrākarālo mṛgagaṇamanupraviśya mṛgaṃ gṛhītvā yathākāmakaraṇīyaṃ karoti |
SA11n1106:5421: sa ca mṛgarājo'tibalaṃ vyālamukhamāsādya vivaśo bhavati |
SA11n1106:5422: evameva mahārāja viddhasya mṛtyuśalyena apagatamadasya atrāṇasya apratiśaraṇasya aparāyaṇasya marmasu cchidyamāneṣu māṃsaśoṇite pariśuṣyamāṇe parituṣitavihvalavadanasya karacaraṇavikṣepābhiyuktasya akarmaṇyasya asamarthasya lālāsiṃghāṇakapūyamūtrapurīṣopaliptasya īṣajjīvitāvaśeṣasya karmabhavāt punarbhavamālambamānasya yamapuruṣabhayabhītasya kālarātrivaśagatasya caramāśvāsapraśvāseṣūparudhyamāneṣu ekākino'dvitīyasya asahāyasya imaṃ lokaṃ jahataḥ paralokamākramataḥ mahāpathaṃ vrajataḥ mahākāntāraṃ praviśataḥ mahāgahanaṃ samavagāhamānasya mahākāntāraṃ prapadyamānasya mahārṇavenohyamānasya karmavāyunā nīyamānasya nimittīkṛtāṃ diśaṃ vrajato nānyat trāṇaṃ nānyat śaraṇaṃ nānyat parāyaṇamṛte dharmāt |
SA11n1106:5423: dharmo hi mahārāja tasmin samaye trāṇaṃ layanaṃ śaraṇaṃ bhavati |
SA11n1106:5439: duḥkhānyeva agnayaḥ tai saṃtāpitānāṃ sattvānāṃ śāntiṃ jātyādiduḥkhānalatāpapraśamanam |
SA11n1106:5451: evamabhyudayasaṃpadi pareṣāṃ ceto vidhāya niḥśreyasasaṃpadi pradarśayannāha kadetyādi-
SA11n1106:5454: kadā kasmin kāle upalambhadṛṣṭibhyo bhāvagrāhābhiniviṣṭebhyo deśayiṣyāmi prakāśayiṣyāmi |
SA11n1106:5460: puṇyasya jñānādeḥ saṃbhāraṃ kadā upalambhadṛṣṭibhyo deśayiṣyāmīti saṃbandhaḥ |
SA11n1106:5468: tadevamanena sarveṇa aśeṣasaṃkleśahetusarvasamāropavikalpapratipakṣatayā sarvāvaraṇaprahāṇopāyatvāt samastatathāgatādhigamahetutvācca sarvaduḥkhopaśamopāyaprajñā upajāyate ityupadarśitaṃ bhavatīti ||
SA11n1106:5471: te santo guṇadoṣayorapi ca taiḥ sāraṃ vimiśrādato
SA11n1106:5472: grāhyaṃ sarvamakalmaṣaṃ viṣamiva tyājyaṃ duruktaṃ yadi ||
SA11n1106:5478: yaḥ saṃvṛtyā vrajati manaso gocaratvaṃ kathaṃcit
SA11n1106:5479: tādṛśyarthe skhalati na matiḥ kasya vai mādṛśasya |
SA11n1106:5484: yatpuṇyaṃ samupārjitaṃ hitaphalaṃ tenāśu sarvo jano
SA11n1106:5493: āśu prāptikarī jinasya padavīṃ sādya likhitvā mayā
SA11n1106:5494: prāptaṃ yatkuśalaṃ susaṃpadi padaṃ tenāstu buddho janaḥ ||
